story:
More and more people start to appreciate nature, and summer is the perfect time of the year to go camping and on picnic. These have become the favourite activities to get closer to nature while having some fun times with family and friends.

The downside of summer is that we are not the only ones to enjoy it. Bugs like mosquitoes thrive in the warm weather as well, and you are almost definitely going to suffer from mosquito bites in the outdoors. In most cases, mosquito bites will only cause redness and itchiness, however in some areas of the world, mosquitoes transmit infectious diseases such as Malaria, West Nile virus or Dengue fever, which can lead to 725,000 deaths per year.

To protect ourselves from getting bitten by mosquitoes indoors, we normally exterminate them by using sprays or other bug killers. But what about when we’re outdoors? How to enjoy a mosquito-free, happy and safe time?
 

As outdoors & people lovers, we’ve been looking for the most perfect solution for some time now, and we have found it! The Enkeeo’s Mosquito Zapper Lantern.

 

Enkeeo is focused on making better outdoor equipments to create a safer outside environment for people. Concerned about mosquito bites for a long time, and after one year development by dozens of designers and engineers, this hybrid of Mosquito Zapper and Lantern was created. We named it Mosquito Zapper Lantern.

Physical Kill - safe and eco-friendly, zero emission of toxic chemicals

Waterproof IPX6 - you can rinse it off with water

3 Modes of Lighting

-Low light (20% Lighting): ≥ 30 lumen, ≥ 20h

-Normal light (50% Lighting): ≥ 90 lumen, ≥ 12h

-High light (100% Lightning): ≥ 180 lumen, ≥ 6h

Easy Positioning - you can hang it on tents or trees, you can put it upside down.(Recommended hanging height is 0.8m to 1.2m)

Compact Design - measures only φ88mm x 129mm, very small

Long Battery Life - 2000mAh battery, one charge can last up to 20h

USB charging - the port is under a waterproof plug for protection.You can charge the zapper lantern with a car charger or other portable power sources like power banks.

UV Light Attraction - mosquitoes won’t be able to resist this fatal temptation!

More details:

The Mosquito Zapper Lantern emits ultraviolet light with visible light to attract mosquitoes. UV light of 360nm to 400nm has the best attraction, and it’s harmless to human body.

When the mosquito is attracted and flies into the lantern, the zapper will immediately kill it with 1000V electricity.

It took us a year and a half to take Mosquito Zapper Lantern from scratch to the end product. Now we need your help and support to take it even further.

Product Design        $ 1,950

Materials                   $ 4,550

Labor                          $ 385

Packaging                $ 535

Shipping                   $ 3,285

Marketing                $ 2,500

Website                    $ 1,500

Miscellaneous        $ 1,000

Total                          $ 15,705

How the Mosquito Zapper Lantern work to kill the mosquito?

Enkeeo Mosquito Zapper Lantern emits ultraviolet-visible light to attract mosquitoes. It is demonstrated that UV light of 360nm to 400nm has the best attraction on bugs, and it’s harmless to people. Once the mosquito is attracted by this UV light, the wired grid will electrify it with its 1000V

Is it the electrified wire dangerous for people?

It is highly recommended not to touch the inner wire inside of the plastic cage. This 1000V power is not dangerous to people, but it can feel like a pinch if you touch it.  To add extra security, the space between the slots that surround the wire is narrow enough to prevent the fingers from going inside. It is advised to keep out of reach of children.

What’s the Mosquito Zapper Lantern warranty?

Enkeeo products offer a 12-month warranty.

My PayPal transaction doesn’t work, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any payment issues.

How much will it cost to ship the Mosquito Zapper Lantern to my country?

We provide free shipping to (USA ,United Kingdom , Spain ,Germany , Italy and France ), and Our warehouses are located in the USA and Europe. We will begin to fulfill the orders after the crowdfunding finishes in one month from its launching date.

I have other questions not answered here. Who can help me?

We’re happy to respond to any further queries you might have about the Mosquito Zapper Lantern. Visit our official website: www.enkeeo.com or email us at support@enkeeo.com

Help us share the news of the Mosquito Zapper Lantern! Let your outdoor-lover friends and family know about our project to stop, for once and for all the annoying redness, itchiness and the spread of infectious diseases caused by mosquito bites.


All help is welcomed here! Share on your Facebook wall, Twitter, tell your friends, your neighbours, your butcher…!  Help us spread the word, we need your support. Cheers!

story:
Titan is a cool and practical pen that can be attached to your keys, bag, belt or backpack and used in everyday occasion.  

Titan is so small and light that you can keep it in your pocket, but at the same time you can use it as a real pen, thanks to its original insert system.

It’s made out of titanium grade 5, the strongest available, and carbon fiber, a combination of the two strongest and coolest materials. You can’t go any better than that. A brass version is also available. 


Titan has been engineered and made to perfection, every single small details has been taken care of. If you are looking for a cool EDC pen this is the perfect one. Weight and balance are perfect both for the titanium and the brass version. 

The D1 refill can be easily replaced from the front section or from the back. It is equipped with two o-rings, one for posting the cap and the other one for securing a tight closing and preventing any accidental opening.

D1 refill can be easily changed from the top by unscrewing the front part or you can also change it from the back by unscrewing and pulling out the refill holder.

You can use it both ways:


D1 refill options:



Dimensions:

lenght of Titan closed: 85 mm - 3,35 in

lenght of Titan posted: 140 mm - 5,51 in

lenght of the pen section: 80 mm - 3,15 in

weight of Titan in titanium: 20 gr - 0,71 oz

weight of Titan in brass: 28 gr - 0,99 oz

Production Plan : 

Based on our last projects we experienced that we need three months after the end of the project before we start delivery.   If the project ends successfully we are confident to say that delivery will start in April 2016. 

Like in all our previous projects, also Titan will be produced in this state of the art facility near Venice, Italy. Quality is our number one priority.


Risks and challenges

I have been making pens for a few years now, I personally design and manufacture all my pens, so I have total control of the manufacturing process and consolidated access to the material suppliers. If this project gets funded I assure that everything will go according to plans and that each deadline will be met.

story:
What's the VUP plus ?

VUP+ is smart  cycling backpack with led signal light and sensor , its’s safe way for bicycling at night  . World's  smallest safest cycling backpack .

When you’re cycling, VUP+ backpack LED lights allow you to be visible from a great distance, enabling drivers to have advanced notice of your position.You can remotely select from four signals, the cycling signal, the left & right turning signal, and the all important caution signal. VUP+ backpack’s storage capacity is up to 15 liters, giving you ample space for any adventure,VUP+ backpack is very compact and easy to store, folding down to as small as your IPAD MINI，take anywhere is so easy  .

VUP Plus Cycling Backpack Keeps You Visible

-Coolwearable

Get more what the backer said at GI gadget Facebook page or follow VUP + Facebook page today ,back up share with your friends get the iPhone 7 Clear case today . 

Product Features

VUP+ backpack is made of high-strength lightweight fabrics, making it only 365g, It’s also water resistant and will dry quickly.  LED displayer and remote controller  with IP5  waterproof when usb port closed.

 

                             Use Cases

VUP+ backpack’s storage capacity is up to 15 liters, giving you ample space for any adventure VUP+ backpack is very compact and easy to store, folding down to as small as your IPAD MIN size 

Why need VUP ? lisening what the backer said 

VUP+ Backpack at Stanford University California

VUP+ backpack  at santa clara  California 

VUP + backpack near of you ,safe for your life , you can get it for you and your friend  .

 LED displayer inside :  

Product  Detail 

 

Easy setup 

 

What this package contains:

1 One backpack
2 One LED displayer
3 One remote controller with plastic mount
4 One micro-USB cable
5 One cable with micro-USB connector on both ends

6 One user manual

perks  backpack only that one just backpack and package not include the LED displayer. remote controller and other accrues . 

Our Team

VUP +  team focus the sport backpack and tech gadget  , designer based in San Francisco bay area , factory in shenzhen of china  ,marketing team in Hongkong ,VUP + team  is a part of the miracase international limted ,  miracase have 15 years ODM factory in shenzhen  for backpack  and other cycling safe bag manufacturer.

at 2014 year our team travel with qinghai yanhu，that place is very beautiful ,our team everyone love there  ,when we come back at night cycling is very danger, kent our  fonder  have  good idea if we can make the led light with the backpack like the car  with  turn left and turn right signal  it's cool,then come back we start that project . 
we have fun ,and enjoy sport life team  .  enjoy the life and safe cycling is for you and your family  .

                         Who we are ?

VUP + team by a group of creative and enthusiastic designer , engineers and those who love the outdoors composed, we are a team with superior professional standards, our innovation, and strive to achieve the ultimate small things. Team members up to 10 years of experience in product design and production cycling backpak In addition, VUP + also has a number of design patents to protect their own interests and partners. We will continue to tap the customer demand for the majority of sports enthusiasts to provide a new experience of the product and make unremitting efforts!

1. No red signal lights are on when you push RC to the backward?

  obably the device runs out of battery, you’d better charge RC

2.How long the charging？ 

Remote control for about half an hour fully charged, the light board for about 1.5 hours fully charged.

3.The  backpack can waterproof ?

yes , Waterproof, lightweight backpack using waterproof fabric, effectively prevent rainwater from entering; remote control inside and outside are designed with waterproof silicone ring and waterproof plug, waterproof grade up IPx5, fully meet under the rain and other inclement weather needs.

4. backpack’s storage capacity?

VUP+ backpack’s storage capacity is up to 15 liters, giving you ample space for any adventure，VUP+ backpack is very compact and easy to store, folding down to as small as your IPAD MINI.

5.How do I check my order status?

Indiegogo's Help Center provides information on a number of basic questions that can be helpful to link to in the FAQ's.

 

Press Kit

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at our pr agency at US  CKC  Worldwide  pratckcang.com at=@

Images & Video Downloads

Please feel free to share any of our Indiegogo page materials on social media. You can download more product images and videos from the links below.

Indiegogo Campaign Images

Video Clips

High Resolution Photos of Bagel

Don't worry about delivery - 

We are guaranteed to start shipping in December 2016 for Early birds ,other shipment at Jan 2017 for all backer .

trial production video  for VUP +backpack 

Charging test and other test in house . 

our manufacturer which is ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certified has over 15  years' experience in the related field. With advanced SMT machine shop, well-organized assembly room and experienced operators, the manufacturer has already built 500  units of vup+ backpack  for trial production. 

SPECIAL THANKS

Richard wedlen ,Paul  John, Ark and  all the user video participants!

Campaign  and PR  - CKC worldwide

story:
LIMITED EDITION SINGLE USE PACKS NOW AVAILABLE!!

(See $5 Perk for details) ------------->



Lets face it, being cold sucks. Skiing, snowboarding, hiking and living your daily life is hard to do when the temperature outside decides to take a plunge. The disappointment of ending your day outdoors early because you or your friends are too cold is not something we should ever have to worry about.  Finally, a better solution is here.

We all know the importance of dressing warmly and smartly, and how it can ruin your time outdoors when you don't. Coldscreen provides the user with an experience of warmth that an extra layer does not give. Our goal with this first version is to open this new choice to stay warm, and educate you on how to do so safely, this is why it does not prevent or cure frostbite or hyperthermia, but is able to get you out there on the colder days and keep you out there warmer,  longer  and focused only on the task at hand!

As the Winter approaches so does the dry air that is in a constant battle with your skin. Instead of focusing on a cure we are focusing on the prevention. Now you can use Coldscreen as your daily moisturizer and to keep you out there warmer for longer!

                                                  

Our ultimate mission at U°THERMIC is to open people up to new choices and a different way of thinking about how you experience the cold. We want to start a revolution in cold experience for every single person who gets outside to do what they love! We should only focus on having fun and nothing else, especially not the uncomfortable and deterring feeling of being cold.



                                           

Coldscreen is specifically formulated with the dry winter air in mind, we used the most safe and healthy ingredients with the highest percentage possible coming from organic and natural sources. 98% Percent to be exact. The rest is to make sure the product stays at the highest quality possible!

                

              

Coldscreen  is able to work directly with your body. While your out there doing activity, your muscles generate a significant amount of heat which gives you the feeling of warmth. However as soon as your body comes to rest the majority of that natural heat is lost through radiation. Coldscreen actively retains your body’s natural heat while you’re resting, yet keeps your temperature regulated while you’re active, so you never overheat.


                                                        THE COLD TRUTH
  1. The body loses 70% on average of its heat though the skin
  2. Dry skin is more of a problem in the winter months as there is less moisture in the air.
  3. Whether it is dry skin or keeping warm, prevention is always better than the cure.
  4. When you feel cold your mind struggles to concentrate and focus on the task at hand
After extensive research and partnering with highly experienced chemists specialising in all natural formulations, we were able to focus on all these problems and develop a diverse product that opens a new choice to help you keep warm and your skin healthy this winter. 


                

We performed the strictest of clinical trials to not only make sure that what we were using ourselves and our families was safe but for anyone who it is going out to. 
The testing analysed and proved the product in a 100% way through:
  • Blind efficacy study with a placebo 
  • Safety and irritation study and a full toxicology report.
Because our goal is to be as transparent and open as possible, the following excerpts are direct originals from the final study report.


     

                             





                 




                                         

  • Increased Warmth
  • Increased Time in lower temperatures
  • Increased Focus on your activities by not worrying about the cold 
  • Increased Space in your bags when travelling
  • Motivates you to get our there on the Colder Days
  • Less Restriction from Bulky Multiple Layers
  • Never get caught out if the Temp Drops while Outdoors
  • Easy to carry on you

                       

We know that a lot of you are wondering if Coldscreen can be used on your face. 

The answer is yes, BUT, not this first version of Coldscreen. We designed this version just for the body to get the best and warmest experience possible! This, we have achieved. Our Face and Kids version will follow very close behind, but we need your help to reach our goal so we can further develop these versions and ensure they are of the best quality! So please SUPPORT us! We are proud to be innovating everyones winter for the better! 


Countries where Coldscreen has been tried and tested:



It’s been a long and wild ride to get to where we are today. Take a look at where we’ve been and where we’re going with your help!


WHY CROWDFUNDING...

Crowdfunding with Indiegogo is a way for people all over the world to join forces to make ideas happen. Since 2008, millions of contributors have empowered hundreds of thousands of inventors, musicians, do-gooders, filmmakers and other game changers to bring big dreams to life. This is the perfect way for Inventors and Creators to fund their initial startup without having to give away equity in the company to investors, also a perfect way for consumers to help bring awesome ideas to life whilst getting these products very first in the world!


(Hamish's Coldscreen Challenge in Iceland, September 2015)

FOR A GREAT INSIGHT TO OUR AMAZING TEAM AND WHAT WE ARE PUTTING TOWARDS THIS CAMPAIGN, WATCH OUR DOCUMENTARY TRAILER HERE AND HELP US BY SUPPORTING THE INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE DOCUMENTARY PERK ABOVE. 


            OUR WAY OF SAYING THANK YOU TO OUR SUPPORTERS




VIDEO UPDATES:

Number 1: 


Number 2:


Where do I apply Coldscreen?
Depending on what level of warmth and protection you desire for the weather  conditions, you can apply it to areas as little as your arms OR to your whole body just like you would a sunscreen. Just remember, it’s not for all of those highly sensitive body areas (YES, you know where we mean.)


How long does it take to work after application, can I wear clothes over top of it, and will it stain?
97% of individuals experience the amazing warm feeling within the first 5-15 minutes. After a few applications you will know the perfect amount of time you need to apply before you venture out into the cold. WIthin that 5 minutes, it will be dry and clothing can be put over the top. Coldscreen works extremely well in conjunction with a windbreaker or any other clothing, and will never stain.


Can Coldscreen be used on the face?
We have specifically formulated this version for the body and not the face. To get the best experience possible, keep the areas in which Coldscreen is applied away from your face, especially your eyes. If this accidentally occurs, wash off with cool water and soap.


Will this stop or help me from getting hypothermia or other similar conditions?
Coldscreen is designed to improve your overall experience of being completely comfortable and warm in the cold. It is not intended as a substitute for appropriate clothing in harsh environments, and will not prevent/cure hypothermia or cold-related conditions. Please use good judgement for the surroundings you will be going into.


Is it water soluble and will it get greasy/oily with sweat?

Sweat will not affect the functionality of Coldscreen, nor will it make it oily or greasy. However you can not go deep sea diving as it is not waterproof!. (Watch this space)


Will I overheat if I end up in a warmer environment?

Coldscreen was designed so that you can be out in a colder environment but still retain your warmth. If you do happen to go past the backcountry and end up in the desert you can easily wash coldscreen off with cold water and soap.


Will it clog pores or cause any side effects

Coldscreen has not ever had any known side effects and is clinically proven to be safe for all skin types. We recommend not using coldscreen if you have any existing skin problems. Sorry! We will be sure to include this in our next formulation.


How much do I use?
The amazing thing about Coldscreen is that you only need the same amount as you would a moisturizer. It is possible to achieve a slightly more effective insulation barrier if more is applied, but this is not normally necessary.


How do I remove Coldscreen?
All it takes to remove is to wash the applied areas with soap and cool water. Within a few minutes the warm feeling will dissipate. We recommend that if Coldscreen has been recently applied or a prominent warmth feeling is still active, to wash it off before getting into a hot tub or shower, so that you are not uncomfortably hot.


Has it been tested on animals?
This can be as simple as NO. Coldscreen has never and will never be tested on our furry friends. Coldscreen is cruelty-free.


Can I reapply once it has worn off?
Yes, you can. We based the lasting effect on half a day of being on the slopes, but if you just can’t get enough, then just reapply at lunch time and you will be good to go again. For the very best results, wash off existing product first.


Should I wash it off before heading to bed?
For those of you who do not normally venture into the shower after a big day of outside activity in the cold, then we do recommend washing Coldscreen off with cool water and soap before bed. Unless, of course, you are sleeping in a cold environment and want that feeling of your own personal heater right next to you. Camping under the stars anyone?


Are there any side effects or possible adverse reactions?
Coldscreen has no known undesirable side effects at all and no cases of any adverse reactions. As everyone’s skin is different, please follow the directions and consult your physician if a reaction does occur. We recommend not using Coldscreen if you have any skin-related health conditions.


Can I use it while pregnant?
As there has not been sufficient testing on this we recommend not using Coldscreen while pregnant.


Can I use it while on medication, drugs or alcohol?
Drugs and alcohol can affect your body’s heat regulation in different way and can cause it to fluctuate significantly. If Coldscreen is being used in conjunction with drugs or alcohol the user may experience a prolonged and increased warming effect. Please consult your doctor prior to using while using medication.


Does Coldscreen work on everyone the same?
Everyone’s skin is different, which means that every Coldscreen user will have a slightly difference experience of warmth and duration of effectiveness. Through countless studies we found and recommend that Coldscreen should be applied to clean, dry skin for the most consistent results.
story_txt:
LIMITED EDITION SINGLE USE PACKS NOW AVAILABLE!!(See $5 Perk for details) ------------->

Lets face it, being cold sucks. Skiing, snowboarding, hiking and living your daily life is hard to do when the temperature outside decides to take a plunge. The disappointment of ending your day outdoors early because you or your friends are too cold is not something we should ever have to worry about.  Finally, a better solution is here.We all know the importance of dressing warmly and smartly, and how it can ruin your time outdoors when you don't. Coldscreen provides the user with an experience of warmth that an extra layer does not give. Our goal with this first version is to open this new choice to stay warm, and educate you on how to do so safely, this is why it does not prevent or cure frostbite or hyperthermia, but is able to get you out there on the colder days and keep you out there warmer,  longer  and focused only on the task at hand!
As the Winter approaches so does the dry air that is in a constant battle with your skin. Instead of focusing on a cure we are focusing on the prevention. Now you can use Coldscreen as your daily moisturizer and to keep you out there warmer for longer!                                                  Our ultimate mission at U°THERMIC is to open people up to new choices and a different way of thinking about how you experience the cold. We want to start a revolution in cold experience for every single person who gets outside to do what they love! We should only focus on having fun and nothing else, especially not the uncomfortable and deterring feeling of being cold.                                           Coldscreen is specifically formulated with the dry winter air in mind, we used the most safe and healthy ingredients with the highest percentage possible coming from organic and natural sources. 98% Percent to be exact. The rest is to make sure the product stays at the highest quality possible!                              Coldscreen  is able to work directly with your body. While your out there doing activity, your muscles generate a significant amount of heat which gives you the feeling of warmth. However as soon as your body comes to rest the majority of that natural heat is lost through radiation. Coldscreen actively retains your body’s natural heat while you’re resting, yet keeps your temperature regulated while you’re active, so you never overheat.                                                        THE COLD TRUTH

The body loses 70% on average of its heat though the skin
Dry skin is more of a problem in the winter months as there is less moisture in the air.
Whether it is dry skin or keeping warm, prevention is always better than the cure.
When you feel cold your mind struggles to concentrate and focus on the task at hand

After extensive research and partnering with highly experienced chemists specialising in all natural formulations, we were able to focus on all these problems and develop a diverse product that opens a new choice to help you keep warm and your skin healthy this winter. 





                
We performed the strictest of clinical trials to not only make sure that what we were using ourselves and our families was safe but for anyone who it is going out to. The testing analysed and proved the product in a 100% way through:
Blind efficacy study with a placebo 
Safety and irritation study and a full toxicology report.

Because our goal is to be as transparent and open as possible, the following excerpts are direct originals from the final study report.





     






                                              











                                         


Increased Warmth
Increased Time in lower temperatures
Increased Focus on your activities by not worrying about the cold 
Increased Space in your bags when travelling
Motivates you to get our there on the Colder Days
Less Restriction from Bulky Multiple Layers
Never get caught out if the Temp Drops while Outdoors
Easy to carry on you


                       
We know that a lot of you are wondering if Coldscreen can be used on your face. 
The answer is yes, BUT, not this first version of Coldscreen. We designed this version just for the body to get the best and warmest experience possible! This, we have achieved. Our Face and Kids version will follow very close behind, but we need your help to reach our goal so we can further develop these versions and ensure they are of the best quality! So please SUPPORT us! We are proud to be innovating everyones winter for the better! 



Countries where Coldscreen has been tried and tested:



It’s been a long and wild ride to get to where we are today. Take a look at where we’ve been and where we’re going with your help!







WHY CROWDFUNDING...


Crowdfunding with Indiegogo is a way for people all over the world to join forces to make ideas happen. Since 2008, millions of contributors have empowered hundreds of thousands of inventors, musicians, do-gooders, filmmakers and other game changers to bring big dreams to life. This is the perfect way for Inventors and Creators to fund their initial startup without having to give away equity in the company to investors, also a perfect way for consumers to help bring awesome ideas to life whilst getting these products very first in the world!


(Hamish's Coldscreen Challenge in Iceland, September 2015)

FOR A GREAT INSIGHT TO OUR AMAZING TEAM AND WHAT WE ARE PUTTING TOWARDS THIS CAMPAIGN, WATCH OUR DOCUMENTARY TRAILER HERE AND HELP US BY SUPPORTING THE INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE DOCUMENTARY PERK ABOVE. 

            OUR WAY OF SAYING THANK YOU TO OUR SUPPORTERS










VIDEO UPDATES:
Number 1: 

Number 2:


Where do I apply Coldscreen?Depending on what level of warmth and protection you desire for the weather  conditions, you can apply it to areas as little as your arms OR to your whole body just like you would a sunscreen. Just remember, it’s not for all of those highly sensitive body areas (YES, you know where we mean.)
How long does it take to work after application, can I wear clothes over top of it, and will it stain?97% of individuals experience the amazing warm feeling within the first 5-15 minutes. After a few applications you will know the perfect amount of time you need to apply before you venture out into the cold. WIthin that 5 minutes, it will be dry and clothing can be put over the top. Coldscreen works extremely well in conjunction with a windbreaker or any other clothing, and will never stain.
Can Coldscreen be used on the face?We have specifically formulated this version for the body and not the face. To get the best experience possible, keep the areas in which Coldscreen is applied away from your face, especially your eyes. If this accidentally occurs, wash off with cool water and soap.

It is not intended as a substitute for appropriate clothing in harsh environments, and will not prevent/cure hypothermia or cold-related conditions. story:
Per il testo della campagna in Italiano clicca QUI.

ATD1 Backpack is the result of years spent traveling, developing soft goods and field-testing them in cities, deserts and forests all over the world. We designed it to be: 

 
  • The shape maximizes internal space while keeping load close to the back. 
  • Roll top construction ensures expandability and weather protection. 
  • No access to main compartment on front and sides means peace of mind in crowded areas. 
  • U-shaped zipper on back panel allows for top and side access and clamshell opening. 
  • Top, sides and bottom handles. 
  • Semi-floating liner for better rain resistance. 
  • Internal stretch pockets keep laptops up to 15″ and books suspended from the bottom
  • Side pockets conceal compression straps and fit water bottles and foldable umbrellas
  • Front compartment has its own volume and features key leash, pen slots and two pockets that work both vertically and horizontally, allowing easy on body access. 
  • Webbing zippers pulls help access and reduce noise. 
  • Compression straps for volume flexibility and to carry additional gear on the outside. 
  • M.O.L.L.E. on bottom lets the user add gear or a bike light. 
  • Hidden or clean finished stitches protect skin from friction and thread from wear.
  • Removable frame sheet made out of Self Reinforced Polypropylene fiber for lightweight load support.  
  • Removable ambidextrous sternum strap, easy to be operated with one hand. 

  • Fabric: 500d, PU coated Cordura® Fabric with DWR. 
  • Lining: 390d, PU coated Nylon with DWR 
  • Webbing: Mil-spec 1’ nylon webbing. 
  • Zippers: YKK 10mm zipper. 
  • Padding: 10mm, closed cell Evazote 50 foam. 
  • Hardware: Made in Italy nylon hardware + ITW Nexus steel hooks 
  • Measurements: 50-70cm x 30cm x 26cm - 19,7-27,5in x 12in x 10,2in 
  • Volume: 20-55 L / 1220,5 - 3356,3 Cubic Inches 
  • Weight: 1,5 kg - 3,3 lbs 
  • Designed, developed and made in Italy

These unbiased video reviews were made by bags connoisseurs Bo Ismono and Chase Reeves: 

 

You can also take a look at these reviews made by Aaron Lam, Aaron Lam again, The Perfect Pack, Globo Surfer and Carryology

 

Our products are covered by lifetime warranty against manufacture and material defects. For any issue that is not caused by noticeable misuse or normal wear and tear, drop us a line and we will fix or replace your pack with a new one.
While all our products are guaranteed against manufacturing and material defects, we do not offer refunds or returns on items received as crowdfunding rewards. 
Import duties and taxes are not included in our reward levels. These charges vary by country and are completely out of our control.

 

Attitude Supply is a design company based in Milan, Italy. Our mission is to make everyday life simpler through durable, versatile and high quality carry goods. 
Our creative process sees no shortcut: from the first sketch to the last prototype, we strictly develop our products in house. This process is expensive and time consuming but it gives us the freedom to test every solution or material and go back to the design board every time we need to. 
Attitude Supply products are designed to be as clean, simple and adaptive as possible, carefully developed and crafted in Italy with meticulous attention to quality and details.
Get in touch via Website, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or Email

 

Although aesthetically simple, this pack's construction is complicated and its production is only approachable through pre-orders: this is why ATD1 is our first crowdfunded project.
Orders will be collected at the end of each month and we'll try to always keep ATD1 in stock: perks will be shipped within two working days if available.
If it's not, production will take one to two months.
We designed the ATD1 for you: where will you take it?

story:
OvenPlus is the perfect combination of a pizza oven and a smokeless grill.  Redesigned the placement of the heating source in the middle of the grill instead of at the bottom. This makes the flame from the plate-shaped Butterfly burner covers both the upper pizza oven and lower grilling area. Offering much more flexibility and allows you to bake, grill, stew, and fry in such a compact portable size.

This change not only provides a steady and evenly-distributed heating source, offers two times more energy efficiency and also make grilling much healthier and tastier.

We identified two main problems with existing grills on the market: as their heat source is placed below the ingredients and the grate, the fat dripping on the heat source produces carcinogens that severely impact our health. Moreover, gas grills only have an energy efficiency of 20% to 30%, which means that they cannot sufficiently utilize energy. This has inspired us to reimagine the barbeque grill as an effective and easy-to-use device.

OvenPlus offers top-down grilling that is easier, safer and tastier compared to traditional, bottom-up grilling. No setting up coals, no scrubbing the grill, no standing around waiting for your food. Top-down grill prevents flare-ups from fat dripping, avoids meat sticking onto the grate, and offers a better grilling experience.

 

OvenPlus' flame can go up to 1100 °F, this is a perfect heat to create Maillard reaction that sears the meat with perfect grilling flavor and locks moisture inside. Every bite comes out juicy and tender inside by creating this mouth-watering dark brown crust on the outside.

What’s the secret for great pizza crust? The answer is the temperature. OvenPlus’ upper ceramic pizza stone can reach temperatures of up to 840°F. It takes only 2 minutes to bake a crispy pizza crust; put it into the lower grill for 2 more minutes to melt the cheese to a beautiful golden brown. A perfect pizza is ready within only 4 mins.

 

OvenPlus is only ⅕ in size comparing to standard American outdoor grill, yet offers way more cooking flexibilities. The upper ceramic pizza stone can do more than just baking perfect pizza. Just set a cast-iron skillet on the top ceramic tray and use it as a regular gas cooker. Cook anything from pizza, steaks, burgers, fish, and lobster to a sunny-side-up egg, baked potatoes, and seafood risotto. With a easy-to-carry design lid handle, OvenPlus is your best choice for the everyday grill, tailgating, camping, and any cookouts!

 

With OvenPlus, anyone can easily cook exquisite meal like a master chef. Check our exclusive recipe includes signature dishes from top restaurant. Cooking dinner for your family can be just so easy!

 

 

 

OvenPlus perfectly balances functionality and efficiency with a special thermal and structural design that boasts energy efficiency of up to 80%, which saves ⅔ energy comparing to the regular gas grill, and performs multiple high-performance applications simultaneously.

We at Lovinflame are committed to revolutionizing traditional heat source structure design,  high energy efficiency and is easy to use. After multiple revisions and experiments, we finally found our solution in late 2018: a unique Butterfly burner design. 

Unlike traditional tubular burners, OvenPlus is designed with a plate-shaped burner—the Butterfly burner. The flame from the Butterfly burner covers both the upper and lower cooking area, providing a steady and evenly-distributed heating source.

 

 

As the Butterfly burner grills the food at the perfect temperature, ventilation holes allow the heated air to rise, creating an even convection with the guided channel and ensuring a consistent cooking temperature in the upper layer. With a 20 lbs gas tank, OvenPlus can offer up to 24 hours grilling time.

 

The Butterfly burner is placed above the grate, this not only just lockin the moisture of grilling meats also prevents fat from dripping onto the burner and significantly reduces chances of food burnt and the smoke with carcinogens. 

On the other hand, while grease collecting by the grease tray, it adds wonderful grilling flavor to the food without making unnecessary smokes.

Excess fat flows down into the grease receptacle, which collects it for easy cleaning. All parts are free to disassemble for cleaning, and also safe for the dishwasher.

OvenPlus with a double cooking area, reliable heating source, evenly distributed heating, and high energy-efficiency allows you to grill easily. Just set a timer and you can create the best dishes like your favorite restaurants! 

To cook a 12 oz., 1.5” thick strip steak to medium-rare, just grill it for 4 minutes on one side. Flip it and cook for another 4 minutes, then take it out and let it rest for 2 minutes. While you’re grilling the steak, you can cook side dishes in the upper pizza oven.

In less than 15 minutes of cooking, you can serve a whole steak dinner for 8 people with OvenPlus. Become a master chef is just so easy with OvenPlus!

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

Lovinflame spent more than a decade exploring the secrets of fire so that we could safely and easily enjoy the elegance and warmth of flames while achieving a balance in our spirit and our health.

We pursue healthy, clean energy, eco-friendliness, and minimal energy consumption. Our main product lines include innovative flame products such as eco-friendly candles and eco-friendly heaters that burn efficiently and minimize air pollution.

Head designer: Jack, R&D Vice President - Product development and certification for gas-based and electrical appliances

Engineer: Allen, R&D Supervisor - Structural development for gas-based products

Engineer: Gene, R&D Supervisor – Structural design, 3D modeling, and operation of CNC machinery

Engineer: ALong, R&D Supervisor – Structural design, and 3D modeling

story:
Do you like to explore the outdoors on your own terms?

Would you like to be better prepared to face the backcountry?

...using hardware you already own, with maps and data that travel with you into that wilderness that has no wireless?

Hello there outdoor adventurer, and thanks for stopping by.

I’m Nathan Mellor, an outdoor enthusiast with a love for maps, and the founder of BackCountry Navigator XE.

My mission: to make outdoor navigation easy and accessible to anyone with a smartphone.

That’s why I created the original BackCountry Navigator, which has been the #1 Maps & Navigation app on the Google Play Store for the past 6 years.

It’s helped countless outdoor adventurers like you to find their way through the wilderness.

Despite its success, I know there’s room for improvement, so I’ve been refining a vision for a brand-new app that’s better than ever.

BackCountry Navigator XE is my vision for the future of mobile outdoor navigation software and I need your help in bringing that vision to life.


 

Designed for today’s tech-smart outdoor adventurers, BackCountry Navigator XE will turn your ordinary smartphone into a full-featured outdoors GPS navigation device.

We plan on making BackCountry Navigator XE the world’s best mobile outdoor GPS app, and here are just a few of the exciting features we’ve got in store for you:

Cross-Platform

The original BackCountry Navigator has only been available on Android (with 4,352 5-star reviews and 6 years at #1 in its category), so I'm really excited to be bringing BackCountry Navigator XE to Android, iOS and the web.

More Maps = More Adventures

A huge selection of maps for exploring the wilderness are at your fingertips with BackCountry Navigator XE. We make it easy for you to download and use topo maps, marine charts, aerial photography and more. Not only that, backers will be first in line to suggest map services from governments or organizations willing to work with us.

 

Overlays Aplenty

We’re enabling the use of more overlay options than ever before, both free and affordable. These will include BLM Boundary maps, property maps, lake map contours, trail maps, specialty data and more. Whatever your adventure, we've got you covered.

Recreation Overlay

 

Easier Grid-Based Organization

Saving map areas offline will be simple, with an easier, grid-based approach. Get it downloaded and keep it organized.

Storage of offline maps

 

Going Global with VECTOR TOPO MAPS

Download vector topo maps for the Earth's surface with easy installation. Compact storage will allow whole states and countries to be downloaded. Flexible styles will make them most readable for you.

 

Vector Topo Maps - large areas, flex style

 

Easy To Learn

One of the major pieces of feedback we've had over the years is that the existing app can be a bit difficult to get the hang of. For BackCountry Navigator XE, we'll be focusing on making the app easy to learn and simple to use, so you can get exploring the outdoors quicker than ever!

Planning In The Cloud

With the cloud editor, you'll be able to plan your treks, and upload tracks and waypoints to customize your adventure on the web before you go. Your plans will synchronize effortlessly with your mobile device so you can navigate the outdoors easily. When you get back home, you'll be able to review exactly where you explored.

Cloud Editor with Easy Sync

 

Sharing Is Caring

When planning and reviewing your adventures, you’ll be able to create links so you can share your plans with your buddies.

 

No Signal? No Worries

Today, your smartphone isn't limited to cell towers; it has the same hardware that’s been used by the military and handheld GPS devices for decades. Download the maps you need before you head out into the backcountry and your phone's GPS will handle the location tracking. BackCountry Navigator XE will work even when there isn’t any cell coverage.

 

  • Hiking and Backpacking, both on-trail and off-trail
  • Camping trips to find that perfect camping site or the way back to camp
  • Kayak and canoe treks on inland lakes and streams or marine and coastal waters
  • Hunting wild game in rugged areas
  • Off-road vehicle driving
  • Search and Rescue (SAR)
  • Geocaching, cycling, fishing, and more!

 

BackCountry Navigator XE will be using a yearly membership across the web, Android, and iOS. This is a necessary change from BackCountry Navigator PRO, because of ongoing costs, such as creating custom maps, running servers, and using cloud features. We believe that the benefits of the new and updated features far outweigh the cost.

When BackCountry Navigator XE is released to the general public, subscriptions will be as follows:

When you support us on Indiegogo today, you’ll get some fantastic discounts and bonuses!

 

When you back the project at Bronze XE level and above, you’ll automatically become part of the BackCountry Community.

In addition to regular behind-the-scenes updates, you’ll get the chance to be surveyed on the highest priority features, review potential UI designs, participate in beta testing and access the final app before the general public.

 

Updated August 24, 2018. Given the current speed of development this is the schedule we expect to follow for the remainder of 2018. 

As part of the BackCountry Community, backers will get the chance to see, test and provide feedback on the app during development, and get access to early versions before it’s released to the general public.

Beta of Website (bcnavxe.com)
April 2018 to October 2018

Beta of Android App in Google Play
July to October 2018

Beta of iOS App in Testflight
September to November 2018

Public Release of Android App & Website
November 2018

Public Release of iOS App
December 2018

Although I am now confident we can meet this schedule the final date for public release is still subject to change due to unforeseen circumstances. It will ultimately depend on App Store approval and our ability to find and fix issues found during the beta testing. Backers will have access to the app throughout the beta period and after release.

And of course, release of a public version is never “final” as updates, improvements, and fixes are ongoing.

With 8 years experience developing and managing the original BackCountry Navigator, I know exactly what it takes to successfully bring an app to market. We’ll be using the funds as follows:


 

In 2009, I was laid off from Hewlett-Packard after 12 years working as a software engineer.

The day after that, my youngest son Jonah was born.

Talk about stressful!

Where more sane and logical people would’ve gone and found another job, I pursued my passion for outdoor recreation and chased the dream of running my own online business.

After many long days in front of my computer screen, I brought BackCountry Navigator to market, and after many more, it became the top paid app in what is now the Maps and Navigation section of the Android Market.

Since then, I’ve got on to win multiple awards for mobile app development, written a book on ‘Android Apps For Profit’ and spoken at both AnDevCon (2011-2016) and Wearables TechCon (2015).

BackCountry Navigator has been far more successful than I could’ve imagined at the time, and I’ve learned so much along the way about how software can help people in the outdoors.

I know there’s so much more I can do with BackCountry Navigator XE to help adventurers like you to navigate the outdoors easily and I can’t wait to share this journey with you.

 

Help me bring BackCountry Navigator XE to life, and create the world’s best multi-platform, outdoor navigation software by backing this project today.

Thank you so much for reading, and see you in the outdoors!

- Nathan :-)

Founder of BackCountry Navigator XE

P.S. If you have any questions, check out the FAQs below

 

Will BackCountry Navigator XE work on my phone?

You’ll need one of the following on your smartphone: iOS 9+ (latest recommended) or Android 4.1+ (latest recommended).  

GPS is needed for real time navigation. Most devices today have GPS. If the specs say “GPS” or “Assisted GPS”, that’s okay. Don’t count on using “network location” to navigate in the backcountry.  

An electronic compass sensor is helpful, though not required. Some cheaper phones and tablets leave this out to save money. Again, check the specs for compass sensor.  

You do not need internet access out in the field, but you will need internet access back home to plan for your adventure and preload maps.

Will BackCountry Navigator XE work on my tablet?

Sure. Keep in mind the items mentioned above.  

It is common to leave out GPS in cheap tablets from lesser known brands, while bigger brands usually have them. However, notable big brands that don’t have GPS are the wifi-only iPad tablets and the Amazon Fire.

Will BackCountry Navigator XE use my battery up quickly?

Nope. GPS does use battery power, and you can use it sparingly if you want. In modern phones, however, the biggest drains on a battery are often the screen and searching for a signal when there is none. If you turn on airplane mode and keep the screen off when not staring at it, you can last for full days and sometimes weeks, as has been reported by some. 

What kind of maps can I expect?

Those who have used BackCountry Navigator will be familiar with many of them. A document describing them is at this link. 

What are overlays and what kinds of them will be available as add-ons?

Click here for a summary of what has been available and what we hope to accomplish. 

Can I download the maps?  

Yes .

Will this work if I live in the US/UK/Australia/another country?

Yes. GPS works in all over the world. 

If you’re wondering what maps there will be for you, keep in mind that all countries are part of the world, therefore worldwide sources will work. However, see our provided list of map sources in case there is something specific for your part of the world.

If I have BackCountry Navigator PRO. Will I get updated to the new version automatically?

BackCountry Navigator XE will be a brand-new app with lots of improvements, so you won't just get it by turning on "automatic updates' in Google Play. The best (and quickest) way to get the new app is to back our Kickstarter today.  

BackCountry Navigator XE will be using a yearly membership across the web, Android, and iOS. This is a difference from BackCountry Navigator PRO, but necessary because of ongoing costs of creating custom maps, running servers, and using cloud features. We believe that the benefits of the features far outweigh the cost.

What about today's BackCountry Navigator PRO (for Android)?

Since BackCountry Navigator XE won't be out publicly until December, you will, I hope, still get a lot of use out of the BackCountry Navigator you have now.  

While we hope that BackCountry Navigator XE will be so good that everyone will want to jump to it right away, we acknowledge that some users will take months or more to transition.  

The BackCountry Navigator of today will continue to be supported and updated much as it has been even long past the release of BackCountry Navigator XE

I very recently bought BackCountry Navigator PRO, plus some add-ons, and a subscription? Are you forcing me to buy something else now?

Since BackCountry Navigator PRO will still be supported and updated, no one is being forced. As mentioned above, we prefer that people want to move to XE.  

If you have a subscription to Accuterra or Caltopo maps, we recommend you keep it active at least until you are ready to move to XE.  

We plan to work out a process to give credit to those who have bought BackCountry Navigator in the last 1-2 years or have unexpired subscriptions or add-ons. This credit will likely be in the form of virtual currency in the new app, discount on membership, or an extension of a membership.  

This process cannot be worked out till BackCountry Navigator XE is released. And we certainly plan to automate the process, because we want to avoid doing this one at a time for 100,000+ people.

Where is my pledge money going?

66% Research and Development of software

26% Content Creation  

8% Indiegogo fees + payment processing

When will I get my app?

April 2018:  Beta of website bcnavxe.com begins. 

July to October 2018: Beta of Android app on Google Play

September to November 2018: Beta of iOS app through TestFlight

November 2018: Expected public release of Android app

December 2018: Expected public release of iOS app. 

Can I share your project on Facebook?

We'd love it if you did! Thank you! Simply click the button below:

Do you have a press kit I can download?

We sure do! Click the button below to view and download it:

 Thanks again!

- Nathan Mellor
Founder of BackCountry Navigator XE

story:
Meet Airblock

 

BUILD IT. CODE IT. FLY IT.

CREATE FROM YOUR IMAGINATION

With magnetic attachments and modularity, the Airblock drone is only limited by your imagination. We want to encourage the spirit of creation in everyone!

IN THE MEDIA

 

FEATURES

 

 

Airblock is made of magnetic, modular parts that are easy to assemble and disassemble without the need for tools. Airblock has two main modes: hexacopter drone and hovercraft, but with its modularity you can create even more modes!

Airblock is made of lightweight, engineered foam that is soft, strong and durable. The fans/blades are surrounded by hexagons, so they’re not directly exposed to objects. Airblock is safe to fly around kids and for kids to safely fly.

 

A hovercraft moving in a triangular formation.

 

Programming is the language of the future, and many are starting to learn at a young age because it also helps to develop logical thinking and problem solving. Imagine a cool stunt and have it become a reality with the Makeblock app. It’s simple to use. Simply drag-and-drop different blocks of commands -- like forward, pause, turn, and forward--and connect them together to create a seamless action. 

 

 

Propel a lego car forward with Airblock!

 

 

Even regular cups become a thing of fun!

 

Creating is in our nature, we’ve always strived to build things bigger and better. Combine Airblock with other toys or parts and make the most of it! Create things from cars to streamers to dancers -- the fun is in your hands...and in your mind. 

 

With Airblock, you’re able to compete in a variety of games. Race against each other in different modes or even have an epic air battle! Tell your buddies about Airblock, because the only thing more fun than flying an Airblock is flying an Airblock with friends! 

Tweet It To Your Friend

Share on Facebook

 

Airblock is fun whether you're just flying it around the house or controlling it in a pool or on land! Fly over new terrain and explore new horizons for an amazingly exciting adventure! 

 

 

Crash it and rebulid it! It's fun to watch it hit walls and crumble into building blocks. The soft and durable foam material makes it crash-friendly, but you don't have to worry about damaging walls or furniture. 

 

 

 

The controller was designed to be the command station that brings your imagination to flight. From the app, you can drag-and-drop blocks to create flight codes, then assign the code to a button. If you don’t feel like coding, you can just commandeer Airblock using the joystick controls.

THE AERODYNAMICS BEHIND THE HOVERCRAFT

 

 

 

The lift from the four propellers allows Airblock to do a number of stunts, and by selecting two propellers from either side, it can generate specific movements. For instance, the two propellers located on the back of the hovercraft drive the hovercraft forward. The two propellers located in the front drive the hovercraft backward. Getting two propellers to push against each other enables the hovercraft to go left or right. With a little bit of knowledge in physics and aerodynamics, you can even make the hovercraft drift, slide or rotate in any direction!

 

WHY WE CREATED AIRBLOCK

Why a Drone 

When kids are younger, they only look at the things in front of them, but as they get older they start to look up and see a whole new world soaring above them. We have always been fascinated with what we couldn't do ourselves -- flight. We wanted to create a flying toy that children can make on their own and proudly exclaim it is their work and theirs only as it flies above their heads.

Why We Created a Modular Drone 

There aren't a lot of drones that are created so kids and adults can build and play. The toy drones available now are so easily broken, so we wanted to created a drone that kids can build on their own and crash without having to worry about damaging furnitures or breaking easily. 

Why We Created a Programmable Drone

Programming is not only useful for future programmers and computer scientists, but also plays a vital role in the child’s learning phase. We hope to use more interesting and interactive programming gadgets to foster children’s love for science and technology. We hope our gadgets can attribute to a child’s development and stimulate children to think independently and solves problems creatively.

AN ACTIVE COMMUNITY WITH OVER 400K USERS GLOBALLY

We’re passionate about robotics and STEM concepts, so our dream is to let everyone experience that sense of accomplishment that comes from creating something out of nothing. We want people to be amazed and think “wow, I made that?”After successfully funding (and shipping) four Kickstarter campaigns, we were able to bring our passion to people worldwide. We hope you will join us in becoming future makers. 

 THE PROCESS OF CREATING AIRBLOCK

OUR TEAM

 

Makeblock was founded by Jasen Wang after he quit his 9 to 5 job to further his passion for robotics. He is a firm believer that life experiences lead to learning. He is passionate about the power of STEM and furthering education through robotics. With a talented staff of engineers and creative thinkers, Makeblock has become a global leader in the maker movement. Jasen and his team dream of gifting users with the knowledge and tools to take their first step into robotics, engineering and flight. 

TECH SPECS

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We are a well-funded, fast-growing robotics startup based in Shenzhen. We are committed to ensuring that our backers receive their Airblock on time. We strive to keep backers up-to-date about production and fulfillment. If there are any unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide an estimated delivery date.

If you have any questions, please contact us at airblocksupport@makeblock.com

We've incorporated the amazing ability of flight with basic engineering and coding! It's not only fun and ultra-cool to play, but it gets you to see flight in a whole new way. And the best part … the Airblock is only $129!CREATE FROM YOUR IMAGINATIONWith magnetic attachments and modularity, the Airblock drone is only limited by your imagination. We want to encourage the spirit of creation in everyone!IN THE MEDIA FEATURES   Airblock is made of magnetic, modular parts that are easy to assemble and disassemble without the need for tools. THE AERODYNAMICS BEHIND THE HOVERCRAFT

 
 

 
 
The lift from the four propellers allows Airblock to do a number of stunts, and by selecting two propellers from either side, it can generate specific movements. For instance, the two propellers located on the back of the hovercraft drive the hovercraft forward. The two propellers located in the front drive the hovercraft backward. Getting two propellers to push against each other enables the hovercraft to go left or right. With a little bit of knowledge in physics and aerodynamics, you can even make the hovercraft drift, slide or rotate in any direction!
 
WHY WE CREATED AIRBLOCK

Why a Drone 
When kids are younger, they only look at the things in front of them, but as they get older they start to look up and see a whole new world soaring above them. We have always been fascinated with what we couldn't do ourselves -- flight. We wanted to create a flying toy that children can make on their own and proudly exclaim it is their work and theirs only as it flies above their heads.
Why We Created a Modular Drone 
There aren't a lot of drones that are created so kids and adults can build and play. The toy drones available now are so easily broken, so we wanted to created a drone that kids can build on their own and crash without having to worry about damaging furnitures or breaking easily. 
Why We Created a Programmable Drone
Programming is not only useful for future programmers and computer scientists, but also plays a vital role in the child’s learning phase. We hope to use more interesting and interactive programming gadgets to foster children’s love for science and technology. We hope our gadgets can attribute to a child’s development and stimulate children to think independently and solves problems creatively.
AN ACTIVE COMMUNITY WITH OVER 400K USERS GLOBALLY

We’re passionate about robotics and STEM concepts, so our dream is to let everyone experience that sense of accomplishment that comes from creating something out of nothing. We want people to be amazed and think “wow, I made that?”After successfully funding (and shipping) four Kickstarter campaigns, we were able to bring our passion to people worldwide. We hope you will join us in becoming future makers. 
 THE PROCESS OF CREATING AIRBLOCK

OUR TEAM

 

Makeblock was founded by Jasen Wang after he quit his 9 to 5 job to further his passion for robotics. He is a firm believer that life experiences lead to learning. He is passionate about the power of STEM and furthering education through robotics. With a talented staff of engineers and creative thinkers, Makeblock has become a global leader in the maker movement. Jasen and his team dream of gifting users with the knowledge and tools to take their first step into robotics, engineering and flight. 
TECH SPECS

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX



 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Risks and challenges
We are a well-funded, fast-growing robotics startup based in Shenzhen. We are committed to ensuring that our backers receive their Airblock on time. We strive to keep backers up-to-date about production and fulfillment. If there are any unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide an estimated delivery date.
If you have any questions, please contact us at airblocksupport@makeblock.com

story:
We are closing down our Indiegogo Campaign. It was wonderfully successful and we appreciate all of our backers.

Please visit http://www.colbyvalve.com to order. Colby Valves are also available on Amazon.com. 

If you ride off-road, at some point your cheap tire valve stem is going to break. Current valve stems require special tools and removal of your tire to replace the valve. That usually means driving back to camp and ruining the tire and sometimes the wheel in the process. 

The patent pending Colby Valve is the only tool-free solution for replacing tire valve stems on-location in 5 minutes or less. No tire removal. No tools. No problems.

It's a cheap insurance policy that every off-road rider should have.

INSTALLED ON COLBY'S WHEEL:

We offer 2 types of Colby Valves: the Emergency Valve and Permanent Valve. The only difference is the way they clamp down. The Emergency Valve uses a "winged spacer" design that you see above. This allows a completely tool-free installation. The Permanent Valve uses a hex nut that you need to tighten with a socket or wrench.

Here's a comparison chart:

The Colby Valve is a replacement valve that can be installed from the exterior of your wheel in 5 minutes or less. The Emergency version features tool-free installation and replaces your current valve stem in the case of leaking or breakage. 

When your valve stem fails, simply pull it out or push it into the tire cavity. Then take the Colby Valve and insert it into the valve stem hole until the rubber gasket sits flush. Hand tighten the spacer until it stops, and you're done. The Colby Valve will create a super strong air-tight seal that can then be inflated with any Schrader compatible pump.

Not only can you get back to civilization, you can keep going and enjoy your adventure or finish your work. The Colby Valve is 20X stronger than the common valve stem, so you're good to go. 

If you ride off-road, eventually you're going to break a valve stem. Unfortunately, it happened to Colby the day of a race. The result? A ruined tire and a disappointing weekend. 

When Colby headed to his grandfather's shop to fix his RZR, his grandfather, Neil, had an idea. What if he could make a replacement valve stem that could be inserted from the outside of the wheel without removing the tire? You'd no longer need special equipment and valve issues wouldn't ruin your fun. Well, he did just that and Colby Valve was invented.

Neil started by building his valve and spacer concept from brass bar stock on a small lathe at his shop. He then reached out to a local rubber molder and had a few seals made. After tapping the valve to work with a simple wing nut, he had a working prototype.

Neil started showing the prototype to a few friends. Not only did they think it was a good idea, many asked to buy one. Others were so excited that they tried to invest money in the idea. With this feedback, Neil decided he should give this idea more focus.

As Neil asked around for marketing help, he kept running across the same name: John Scott Bull. JS worked at a global manufacturing company in sales and marketing, and had a history of start-ups. Neil stopped by JS's office and showed him the prototype. JS saw the potential and partnered with Neil to bring the idea to market.  

While they worked to find manufacturing sources and finalize a design, Neil made some additional prototypes. Colby and his friends received the first few. 

Ironically, the weekend Colby got his prototype, he was climbing up a creek bed in his RZR and heard a hissing noise. One of his valves had hit something and was leaking air. He pulled onto some flat ground and used the Colby Valve. In just a few minutes, he was ready to roll. Instead of having to replace a second tire in a matter of weeks, he was back on the trail riding just like he was before. 

A couple of weeks later, he and his friends were riding at White Rock in Arkansas. They came upon a broken down buggy on the trail. The rider had busted a valve stem on a large rock and had no idea how to get off of the trail without ruining the tire. Colby pulled out the Colby Valve and once again, in a matter of minutes, the rider was good to go. 

Since that time, about 20 prototypes have been passed out and Neil decided to put his money where his mouth is and installed it on his Ford F-150 King Ranch. In every instance, the Colby Valve has performed perfectly, and without issue.   

While we've already built prototypes and proven that Colby Valve is the strongest, easiest tire valve replacement, we have a few more steps to make it happen. We need to invest in machine tooling and injection molds. Since we've already identified our domestic sources, we know what this will cost. Also, the more supporters we have here, the easier it will be to work with banks to get a line of credit to fund our production.

But enough about us. Here are a few reasons why YOU should back us now:

  1. Big discount. You'll save up to 33% on your Colby Valve compared to what they will be priced in the market. 
  2. Get it first. Our Indiegogo supporters will get the first production units. If we are successful, it will still take a few months to get these out through distributors, so the way to get it quickly is to back us here. 
  3. Make it happen. Raising this capital is critical for us to be able to reach production capability. If we don't get the backing we need, you may not have another chance to buy a Colby Valve. 

Here is why this campaign is SUPER low risk for you!

  1. We already have the design perfected and tested. We know it works. 
  2. We have identified our suppliers and we know what it costs to make. 
  3. We have a short lead-time to market, so we'll be shipping by the end of this year. 
  4. Since our custom parts are all made in the USA, we don't run risks associated with foreign sourcing.
  5. Our team has decades of engineering and manufacturing experience. We've done this as a manufacturer for other companies for years, so we know how to make a great product. 
  6. We have our patent already pending, so our design is secure. 

When you're dealing with wheels, safety is paramount. This is why we are making Colby Valve more than 20X stronger than most valves on the market. In fact, it's likely that your wheel will give out before the Colby Valve does.

Can't contribute at this time? No problem. As long as we get to market, you'll have a chance to get a Colby Valve when the time is right. To get to market, we need to hit our goal. Help us do that by:

  • Telling your friends
  • Posting on social media
  • Asking your local stores if they know about us. If stores pre-order from us here, we'll hit our goal in no time, and they'll be the first to be able to offer it to their customers.

story:
The Tahquitz Pack, named after the birthplace of present day climbing, is built for those who aim to explore.

Highly functional and modern in design we've created a versatile pack that conforms to your lifestyle—whether heading to the crag, traveling the globe, or dawn patrolling a surf session, we’ve got you and your belongings covered.

 

 




—

 

 

 

 

  

Endless Possibilities for Packing

   

  

 



Laptop Sleeve

Our internal pouch, capable of fitting a 15" laptop, doubles as a hydration sleeve. With hose ports on both left and right shoulders you will be ready for anything that comes your way.



Hidden Water Bottle Pocket

Water bottle pockets can look sloppy, that’s why we’ve hidden ours with a simple zip. Bring whatever bottle you need (our stretch mesh fits most bottle sizes). Unzip, pack, and be on your way.



Impeccable Fit

Our suspended shoulder strap system keeps the pack close to your body while alleviating weight points so you can spend less time stressing and more time exploring.



 


The Cabrillo Dry Bag plays an integral role to the Tahquitz Pack, integrating seamlessly into the side pocket.

Camera Case meets Dry Bag. The Cabrillo Dry Bag, like Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo, is meant for exploring in places where the presence of water is absolute but the need for a camera is mandatory. In addition to being 100% waterproof, our molded foam insert will keep your camera and accessories protected from any element, bang, drop or tumble they might find.



—

 

 

 

 

 

We are a group of individuals who choose to live rather than to exist. We are not professional athletes. Nor are we fashionistas, globetrotting from one beautiful destination to the next. We are regular people who go into the world with open eyes and a full hearts and we know we are not alone. This is why we created BE—to share, advocate and encourage the world to embrace the outdoors through thoughtfully designed products. 

Designed to Discover. Built to Explore. Be is the Outfitter.

Thanks for your support!

—Rory, Jeff & the BE Team

story:
Introducing the Kosan Travel Pack system, the world’s most comprehensive travelling system. A counter balanced, 5-in-1 detachable carrying system designed specifically for travellers. This incredibly durable two-bag system will change the way you travel, making your journey easier, safer and more comfortable than ever.

 

 

The only thing guaranteed in life is change. And your travel bag needs to adapt to fit those changing needs, and life's many unexpected adventures. We’ve designed our system with the versatility and flexibility to take whatever you throw at it. With 5 carrying options, each bag can transform to fit your needs from a weekend getaway in Amsterdam, to a month long safari through Tanzania.

 

 

   

We've designed two beautiful bags that work together seamlessly. Our Carryall Pack (35L) quickly converts from a duffle bag into a high performance backpack. 

And our Day Pack (15L) quickly converts from a messenger bag to a backpack. 

Your Day Pack can then easily connect to the main Carryall Pack via our durable spring clips. This two-bag system distributes the weight of your gear, allowing you to travel efficiently, securely and hands free to each new destination. 

 

  

 

       

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

    

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At​ ​Kosan,​ ​we’re​ ​all​ ​travellers​ ​and​ ​we​ ​know​ that when​ ​you​ ​invest​ ​in​ ​a​ ​travel​ ​bag,​ ​you expect​ ​that​ ​bag​ ​to​ ​go​ ​the​ ​distance​ ​with​ ​you​ ​-​ ​wherever​ ​that​ ​may​ ​be.​ ​ All​ ​of​ ​our​ ​products​ ​are​ ​built​ ​to​ ​last and we ​are​ ​working​ ​with​ ​the​ ​best​ ​factories​ ​and​ ​materials in​ ​the​ ​business.​ ​That's why we were are backing up our system with a Lifetime of Travel warranty, it's our guarantee that this bag will stand the test of time. ​However,​ ​it's life and stuff​ ​happens, so If​ ​you​ ​have​ ​a​ ​problem,​ ​let​ ​us​ ​know,​ ​and​ ​we'll​ ​fix​ ​it​. Plain and Simple! 

 

  

 Fits everything you need for short term or extended travel! 

 

   

  

We spent the last few months field testing the system all throughout South East Asia. On our journey throughout Thailand, Cambodia, Vietnam, Indonesia and the Philippines, we gathered feedback from travellers and made the necessary tweaks to ensure the bag would stand up to our lifetime warranty. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 We're happy to say it took everything we threw at it! 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

                       

 

 

   

 

 

The design for the Kosan Travel Pack System began some 10 years and 30 countries ago. Ever since we started travelling, we felt like there had to be a more comfortable and smart way to carry your gear. After about a year of planning and research, we finally put pen to paper and began designing the bag.  

  

 

 

 

We are working with an incredible factory to design and produce this bag. Located in Vietnam, just outside of Ho Chi Minh City, they are absolute pros at making all sorts of technical bags, as well as paragliding equipment! When the quality of gear can result in life or death, we knew that this was the perfect factory for us.   

 

 

After submitting initial sketches and the first few prototypes, we hopped on a plane to Ho Chi Minh to meet with our factory partners face-to-face. We wanted to be very hands-on with the factory, to oversee the quality and get to know exactly where and who would be making our bags. 

We spent a week living at our factory manager’s dormitory, ironing out the finer details of the bag.

Every day, we worked alongside our team and met with and visited local fabric suppliers. We ate lunch with the factory workers (fish and rice) and spent a day testing out our latest prototype in the Mekong Delta with the team. We were even invited to a Vietnamese wedding where the karaoke was mandatory!

  

 We are Kosan, a small group of friends who love to travel. We started Kosan because we wanted to help travellers prepare for their journeys by making clothing and gear for world travel. And by world travel, we mean the kind where you submerse yourself entirely in new cultural experiences, which is at the heart of our business. We started Kosan for three reasons:

1) We love to travel. Like REALLY love to travel.

2) We believe with all our hearts that travel is fundamental to overcoming bigotry and prejudice. Through travel and trade, we can all work towards a more peaceful and accepting world. 

 

3) It’s high time a company made goods exclusively for travellers.

  

 

 

 

We believe that travel can effect positive change by inspiring new perspectives about the world you live you in, and that the more you travel, the better off the world will be. We also know that the better prepared you are, the more you will be able to enjoy the experience. So, we’ve set out to build the best products for those who travel the world, and our mission is to help our travelers prepare for their journey. Thanks for all of your support! If you have any feedback or questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. We'd love to connect. 

 

 

Campaigns on Kickstarter are built on word of mouth, so we need your help to spread the word. Follow along our adventures below and feel free to share with a friend.

This incredibly durable two-bag system will change the way you travel, making your journey easier, safer and more comfortable than ever.  The only thing guaranteed in life is change. And your travel bag needs to adapt to fit those changing needs, and life's many unexpected adventures. We’ve designed our system with the versatility and flexibility to take whatever you throw at it.
