 Back this campaign so you can be part of our next creation and get a great deal while doing so. Thank you! 
Addons:
 
The Taskin ONE is only the latest of our many awesome travel gear. For backing ONE you will get access to some exclusive deals on some of our top gear. These addos will be available to add to your pledge as you check out. 
Air Duo
On one side: An air-breathable 100% see-through section to keep fresh clothes wrinkle-free. On the other: An odor and water-resistant pouch to keep dirty laundry sealed up tight. Both sides: Packing perfection. 



 
Air Duo sets come in 2 sizes
Air Duo Packing Cubes - 3X

3 of our large sized packing cubes, the ones featured in the Taskin ONE's video. The are the perfect size to fit into ONE's two packing section and the main section.
Air Duo Packing Cubes - 6X

 
2X each of Extra Large, Large and Medium sizes for use in your new Taskin ONE and carry-on size luggage.
Taskin ROLR 5-in-1 Toiletry Bag
A Totally Modular Experience
Taskin ROLR is the only toiletry bag you can custom-configure for your specific needs, on every trip you take.
In fact, ROLR is 5 ingeniously-designed toiletry bags rolled into one. You can pack them individually for a quick weekend getaway, or connect them together into whatever configuration you need for your next big client pow-wow in Boston, or that African safari you've been dreaming about. Plus, two or more ROLRs can be combined, so you can zip together custom combinations for a more personalized travel experience. Just don't be surprised if you start wondering how you stayed so fly without it.

 
Taskin KUBE V2 Duffle
Sleek design and exclusive features make Taskin Kube the best-designed duffel bag anywhere - now upgraded to a whole new level.

story:
Short Summary

 

Despite the technologically advanced society we live in, there are some objects that have yet to be digitised for our travel. Either that, or the benefits of carrying them physically greatly outweighs carrying them digitally, since you can never be sure about the accessibility to technology while overseas. Some examples of these objects include: your cash, tickets, brochures, postcards and cards. These items often reduce the quality of our experience as we fumble and tumble to look for them in our bags.

As travellers, we empathise with the frustration with the lack of organisation of the miscellaneous travel essentials - cash, travel tickets, receipts, documents etc. Hence, we decided to formulate a solution for a traveller's most common problem - the travel clutter. A lot of time and effort has been pumped into the project, and we hope that daypocket will be a product that makes a difference to people who face this particular problem. Also, we hope that daypocket will inspire people to look at the conventional notebook in a new light. 

 

MEET DAYPOCKET

Daypocket is a book of pockets that helps you organize your travel miscellaneous prior and during your trip.

A PEEK INTO THE POCKETS

 

Daypocket has 3 pockets of different sizes, designed to cater to your small travel essentials.

 

YOUR SECURITY, OUR PRIORITY

 

Not only is it easy to slip your travel documents into the pockets, it is also extremely secure. Our pockets are designed around the idea that the strongest point of the book would be nearer to the bind itself; the pockets are also facing inwards. Have a peace of mind for you won't have to worry about the contents falling out.

PEN 'EM DOWN

Made of paper produced by a company that is certified responsible forestry and promotes sustainable forest management. Simply plan your itinerary and label your pockets directly on them, no extra tabs needed.

Daypocket also encourages creativity - just draw and sketch on them if you see anything interesting along the way, or if you are just bored and want something to doodle on.

THE PERFECT BIND

 

Bound by a band, every single page is detacheable, and re-attacheable. 

MAKE IT YOURS

 

Customise your book according to the length of your trip. 7 days trip? 7 Pages into the book. 14 days trip? 14 pages in. Easy.

LAY IT FLAT

Ever feel the discomfort when writing on books that cannot be laid completely flat? Fret not, Daypocket lies completely flat when opened up. 

Since every page is detachable, you can even bring the page to the front and use the book cover as a backing to write on. 

RAINY DAY? NO FEAR.

 

Water-repellant fabric is used for Daypocket's cover - just in case your pages of pockets get wet on rainy days. 

THE SWEET SPOT

 

Just a little bonus, there's even a slot for you to carry your pen!

HANDY AND COMPACT

Daypocket is the perfect book for you to bring on your travel and a little bigger than A5.

BEYOND TRAVEL

 

Think daypocket is only suited for travel? Think again. Daypocket is more than just for travel. Use it for your daily/weekly/monthly budgeting, collection of ideas or even planning of events.

DAYPOCKET's COLOURS

Burnt Umber

Ash Grey

Ivory Black

THE PROCESS

Though a seemingly easy idea, we went through many rounds of considerations. We looked at materials, the binding, users' needs, and the smallest details.

 

After countless prototypes, we are proud to present our final design of daypocket to you.

Risks & Challenges

Daypocket is the brainchild of a very dedicated team. A lot of time and effort has been pumped into the project, and we cannot be any more excited to share what we have created with you.

The main challenge we dealt with during this journey would be the designing process of the pockets. Every detail is critical, from the size of the pockets, to the orientation of the pockets on each page, to the material. Our goal? To make them the most intuitive for users.

Post funding, we will continue to look into the materials used for daypocket. We are constantly looking for alternative paper to reduce the thickness of daypocket, but we assure you that we will always consider the environmentally friendly factor before making decisions. We promise to keep you updated with our journey and should there be any delay in the delivery, you will definitely be the first to know.

OUR SCHEDULE

November 2016: Start of Kickstarter Campaign

December 2016: End of Kickstarter Campaign + Launch of Indiegogo InDemand for Pre-orders

January 2017: Established contact with manufacturers

February 2017: Pre-production run

March 2017: Samples & Design refinement

April 2017: Final optimisation for production

May 2017: Full production run

June 2017: Full production run

July 2017: Packaging & Prepare for shipping

August 2017: Daypocket's on its way to your doorstep!

Follow Our Journey!

Contact Us

If you have any queries or requests, please feel free to contact us at daypocket.co@gmail.com

You can also find our press kit here:

story:
What is Lymbit?

Losing your everyday objects has ceased to be a problem with our Lymbit system. We have created and developed a system that along with our gadget allows you to locate your items using your own mobile phone (app), smart watch, Google Glass, or any other device within seconds, finding the last place you left it or even locating it on a map away from you and being able to communicate with someone who is close to your object, no matter how far you may be.


The Lymbit Power



You will be able to control an unlimited number of Lymbit devices attached to any object you want in order to managed them in a clean and comfortable way using Findit App.



Each Lymbit device is equipped with an accelerometer to detect any strange movement of your object. The Findit App will do the  rest to tell it to you.


Locate easily any object around you with the Findit App. The maximum range is 50 meters.



When you walk away from your object, you will receive a notification to your smartphone telling you it. You can set the distance you wish to be notified of custom shape from 1 meter to 50 meters.

You can be notified if something is moving too. The greatest thing is that you will be able to receive all notifications in any device you want: Smart Phone, Smart Watch, Google Glass...



Locate your object in the map with the last known location of the object given by your phone or any nearby person to your object.


You will be able to communicate to any person near to your lost object to ask them for their help in order to recover your lost object.
Our goal is people helping other people just because we are in an awesome connected society full of kindness.


The most advanced technology compatible with iOS, Android, Wearables and Google Glass devices.


It is very important to know the battery level of all devices. That’s why the Findit App will tell you when it is necessary to change the battery of your Lymbit some time before ends. You will be in peace for more than 400 days anyway.


Perks


     5 New colors

     




The four team members are young, eager to do great things in the world and somehow get to change it. We do not want this to stay as a simple desire, we want to make it happen, and we want to do it with Lymbit. Money is not our main goal, we are motivated by something much more powerful: our passion for what we do. And that's the first step to success.

“We are convinced that we will succeed, we just need the final push. Lymbit can be a world leader. It can be the first and best in the industry, but only if people is committed to it.”



Using Lymbit in the real world

We will try to exemplify our product to make fully understood which is the idea we want to convey. We  propose different situations such as:

  1. Keys have been lost at home. Having placed a Lymbit on our key, we will know how close we are to them with a numeric indicator on our mobile phone.

  2. We do not want to leave home without the wallet. Activating the listen mode, we can activate an alert if we move too far from the wallet so we will never leave home without it.

  3. We have gone out for a drink by bike and left it out. Activating the sensor we can detect any vibration in it, so that we know if someone is moving it to try to steal it. The same could be done by sticking the Lymbit to a door, and so we would be warned every time it opens.

  4. We have lost a bag/handbag and do not know where it is. Consulting our map, we can see its last known location while it was being carried.

  5. Our dog is gone missing. We can activate the missing mode which will seek the dog from our network of people, its current position will be updated and we will be given the opportunity to get in touch with someone close to it through internal chat application that communicates without having the contact of the person.


FAQ's

We’re overwhelmed with the feedback and questions received here, on email, Twitter, Facebook and everywhere. Here are the questions more frequently asked! Feel free to leave a comment or email us.

What phones and devices will work with Lymbit?

Lymbit works with iOS, Android, Google Glass and wearables based on these platforms. And we will continue working  to deliver an even better user experience.

What are the Lymbit's dimensions and characteristics?

· Dimensions: 1,7” x 1,7” x 0,20”

· Battery: CR2032

· Hardware: Bluetooth L.E 4.0

What is the range of the proximity sensor?

The Bluetooth signal range is about 164ft (50m) without interferences.

Can I pick a color when I order?

At the right top you can place your order by units. Don't forget to choose the colors you want using the comments section.  

What about shipping cost?

At the bottom of your reward you'll see if shipping is included or not. If it is not included, you will have to pay the amount specified for your area during the payment process.

I have more questions, do you have answers?

Yes! Please leave a comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page, or email us using our contact form at Lymbit.com and we will try to reply as soon as possible!

story:
What is Rocket Hanger?

Rocket Hanger is a folding kids' hanger engineered and designed to look better, feel better, and perform better. It can be used in all conditions.

Two sets purchased = One set donated.

(Every Kid or family need hanger, it looks small and easy for most of us, however, we believe that there are some kids or families still waiting for the help. So, let's try our best!)

There is no innovation in the Kids' hanger industry, maybe people think it is small thing as a small product. But we re-imagined what a kids' hanger should be:

  1. Be attractive and funny to kids 
  2. Easy to use
  3. Protect the clothes

  • What is the shipping cost to U.S.?
        It is FREE SHIPPING to U.S. and only available through Indiegogo !!!
  • Do you ship internationally? What is the shipping cost?
        Yes, we do global shipment, please add $15 as shipping cost
  • When do you start delivery?
         Your perk will be delivered within 1 week from the end of this campaign.


We know that not everyone can contribute financially.  However, sharing our campaign with others would be immensely helpful.

If you have kids, nieces/nephews, friends with kids, etc. please support our campaign by giving the gift of Rocket Hanger to the little ones in your lives.

Thank you for your continued support. It's been invaluable to Rocket all along the way. We wouldn't be where we are without you.

One set = 8 Rocket Hangers + 1 Multifunctional Rocket Box

Use your Rocket Box

Bonus!!!

Rocket Hanger is our first product and we hope you can support on our dream. We focus on the kids' lives, so want to make more innovative products for them. Your contribution will be used design and manufacturing new surprise!!

  • We need $15,000 to start the research and design of NEW ROCKET
  • Any additional funds that we raise will go toward marketing and the roll-out of the Rocket brand. This is for getting more voice from kids and parents.
  • If we don't reach our goal (sad face) we will still continue to that work, however, it will be more difficult and longer time without your support - but let's not talk about that 

What's in next ?


I came up with the idea for Rocket after I became a father. I never thought I will like the baby so much, so I decided to make some things for kids. I talked this idea with my good friend, Andy, a father of a girl. On that talking we were inspired to start a company of our own design for kids. We knew there are lots of branding like similar products, however, we can do better. The importance is that it is our dream and  can make it come true. Today, we want to share our story with global parents, that is we can let the kids' life to be more better together.

We have been working for more than 6 months developing Rocket Hanger and faced some problems during this time. The team members are working very hard to mitigate all the risks.
Design:
As a innovative hanger, the design is critical for this product. We researched lots of existing kids' hanger in the market and optimized our design again and again. Especially for protection feature, we did hundreds of test to make it can protect kids' clothes very well.

Tooling and manufacturing:
We need to create the tooling before manufacturing. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
story_txt:
What is Rocket Hanger?
Rocket Hanger is a folding kids' hanger engineered and designed to look better, feel better, and perform better. It can be used in all conditions.
Two sets purchased = One set donated.
(Every Kid or family need hanger, it looks small and easy for most of us, however, we believe that there are some kids or families still waiting for the help. So, let's try our best!)



There is no innovation in the Kids' hanger industry, maybe people think it is small thing as a small product. But we re-imagined what a kids' hanger should be:


Be attractive and funny to kids 
Easy to use
Protect the clothes



What is the shipping cost to U.S.?
        It is FREE SHIPPING to U.S. and only available through Indiegogo !!!


Do you ship internationally? What is the shipping cost?
        Yes, we do global shipment, please add $15 as shipping cost


When do you start delivery?
         Your perk will be delivered within 1 week from the end of this campaign.









We know that not everyone can contribute financially.  However, sharing our campaign with others would be immensely helpful.If you have kids, nieces/nephews, friends with kids, etc. please support our campaign by giving the gift of Rocket Hanger to the little ones in your lives.
Thank you for your continued support. It's been invaluable to Rocket all along the way. We wouldn't be where we are without you.




One set = 8 Rocket Hangers + 1 Multifunctional Rocket Box




Use your Rocket Box



Bonus!!!







Rocket Hanger is our first product and we hope you can support on our dream. We focus on the kids' lives, so want to make more innovative products for them. Your contribution will be used design and manufacturing new surprise!!

We need $15,000 to start the research and design of NEW ROCKET

Any additional funds that we raise will go toward marketing and the roll-out of the Rocket brand. This is for getting more voice from kids and parents.
If we don't reach our goal (sad face) we will still continue to that work, however, it will be more difficult and longer time without your support - but let's not talk about that 

What's in next ?






I came up with the idea for Rocket after I became a father. I never thought I will like the baby so much, so I decided to make some things for kids. I talked this idea with my good friend, Andy, a father of a girl. On that talking we were inspired to start a company of our own design for kids. We knew there are lots of branding like similar products, however, we can do better. The importance is that it is our dream and  can make it come true. Today, we want to share our story with global parents, that is we can let the kids' life to be more better together.


We have been working for more than 6 months developing Rocket Hanger and faced some problems during this time. The team members are working very hard to mitigate all the risks.

Design:
As a innovative hanger, the design is critical for this product. We researched lots of existing kids' hanger in the market and optimized our design again and again. Especially for protection feature, we did hundreds of test to make it can protect kids' clothes very well.

Tooling and manufacturing:
We need to create the tooling before manufacturing. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

story:
What is Live Tour?

Live Tour is a fantastic online software for travel agents and tour operators. Live Tour automate 85% of activities of a tour operator and make the growth faster and reliable. 

What Is the Status And What We Going To DO
Live Tour is now in the market and many travel agents using the same. We are making its next generation version in Cloud Platform with N number of incredible features to automate the sales channels seamlessly.

You need a DEMO? www.livetoursoftware.com just ask DEMO


WHO ARE THE DEVELOPERS

We are World e Mart  a professional web and software company since 2002. Visit us www.worldemart.com 


  • The success of Live Tour will change many small businesses around the world. It will save a lot if money a travel agent spent to get business and run business.

  • With your help we are making a more connected world and surely it is beneficial for the whole world of travellers. The market place gives trusted network of suppliers where travellers can book hotels, holidays and other travel services without any hesitation.

YOU ARE NOT HELPING US. YOU ARE HELPING YOURSELF AND THE TRAVELLERS ACROSS THE GLOBE...!!!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to make the dream come true:

  • We are looking for $ 300000 or more for the total project.
  • We need to make the dedicated cloud resources
  • We need to take the airline engines directly
  • We need to make an extranet to the hotels for booking engines
  • We need to provide a tool for suppliers 
  • We need to build a market place for B2B
  • Finally launch and marketing for 1 year.

    Even If we not reach the entire goal. Still we develop the software and make it live and we will adjust the resources and marketing fund.

What You Get

  • People who buy Live Tour Perks through this campaign will get a lifetime licence of Live Tour and lifetime free updates.! (Only for the selected Perks. Read it)

  • Those who are buying other perks like travel websites and websites also get our support and consultation FREE!!.

The Impact

We are sure there is no such TRAVEL ERP in the planet offering such features and connectivity by Live Tour.

  • Live Tour redefining the tour operation like following.

The Traditional Method - 

How a tour package selling in traditional method??? See the steps

1. Tour Operator Getting an enquiry
2. Sending itinerary to customer as per requirement 
3. Customer asking modifications 
4. Tour Operator sending revised plan >> The process continue till customer ok with plan or he quit. (average number of mails will be 10 )

Some leads ends here....!!!

If this client is converted do more jobs to finish the case.

5. Client negotiating price (4 more mails)
6. Finalising and sending advance payment
7. Hotel reservation
8. Vehicle arrangements
9. Tickets
10. Houseboats
11. Special inclusions if any

Finally printing vouchers - if it is a 5 Night package 15 vouchers required as copy to hotel, copy to client, copy to vehicle operator.

Mistakes in vouchers also will create problem. Special inclusions marking may be wrong on vouchers as it is hand written.

Just Imagine

If a normal operator selling 5 packages a day, he need to send 2100 mails in a month for package confirmation

He need to generate 2250 vouchers to be prepared

750 hotel rooms to be booked

Cut of date of each hotels to be remembered 

Advance payments to hotel, to agent, by agent, by client, to vehicle, to houseboat, to guide etc ect has to be kept in n number of files..

Its simply hectic right ???? If one package is cancelled what will happen??

It depends operator by operator and their relation with properties...!

HOW Live Tour Operates ??

Live tour can be easily configured from admin end which part of the world you doing your business and you can add / manage destinations and properties you dealing with.

Store itineraries and modify online
Manage properties
Vehicles
Agents
Airlines
Houseboats and many more

The Steps

1. Operator get enquiry to Live Tour (Configured from his site or other enquiry channel)

2. Choose itinerary, Price and send, Modify or give new itineray in same area and client will receive as a separate copy. 

3. On confirmation click on confirm package and system will automatically generate all vouchers and send reservations to all hotels. 

Its over

IT WILL WORK EVEN BETTER


If you use Live Tour as your website backend you dont need to do anything.

Just add packages in Live Tour and it will be displayed in your site. 

Once a customer buy a package online Live Tour will take care rest. Fully automated booking and voucher generation , mailing etc. Because the packages are interlinked with hotels, vehicles, houseboats and agents.

Tour packages will be sold and operated even while you sleep.
Just check your bank account...!!!!

Example :  www.countrytravelmart.com

REPORTS

Live Tour is generating N number of reports and alerts from a single case entry wether it is automated or manual entry.

Ask a DEMO you will be excited for sure...!!!

www.livetoursoftware.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Share this campaign in your friends circle.
  • Use The Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks In Advance

Live Tour Team

www.Livetoursoftware.com

story:
Our Story

I am a high school student in Charlottesville, Virginia, and I want to help the unfortunate people of Haiti through volunteer work.  Early this summer, I will embark on a journey with my father to Thomassin, Haiti.  In collaboration with the Building Goodness Foundation and a group of local Haitians, we will build the Excelsior Technical Institute.  This is a trade school in Thomassin that will teach the population the skills they need to build a community damaged by natural disasters and poverty.  Help us to help them help their nation!


For more information, visit:

http://www.buildinggoodness.org/index.php/proje...


The Impact

Excelsior Technical Institute will have a huge impact on Thomassin both during construction and upon completion.  Local Haitians will be integral to its construction, and the trade school itself will teach current and future generations the skills they need to excel in their community.  I am proud to be helping in the betterment of an impoverished community.

What We Need & What You Get

For this trip, I will need a total of $1,700.  My father will be partially funded by the Building Goodness Foundation because he is a skilled carpenter.  The breakdown is as follows: for travel, we will need approximately $900; for food and lodging, $600; for transfers and taxes, $90; for vaccinations, $110 (My father has already gotten his vaccinations as he went to Haiti in 2011).  If we don't reach our final goal, the money will still go towards paying for the trip.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out to everybody you can! You can use social media websites to spread the word! Thank you!

story:
Long flights, uncomfortable hotel stays, stressful situations, compact itineraries, heavy baggages ... this is the life of any traveler. After days on the road, it is hard to stay energized for everything from ... the biggest projects at work to just spending quality time with your family.  

Sitting in cramped airplane seats, the back of cabs, and sleeping on uncomfortable beds really takes its toll. Our founder, an electronics entrepreneur who frequently travels, had enough of feeling sore and run-down after every trip, and so he decided to do something about it.

Volosano micSTICK™ is the first Gold Awarded mobile therapist with patent pending low frequency microcurrent wave signal generation technologies to bring you a comfortable trip.

Used along with our customized iPhone APP, Volosano turns your smartphone into a discreet, portable, fatigue and ache relieving device that can be used anytime and anywhere. Think of it as a portable therapist on the go.

Until now, there are plenty of travel pillows; but it has been impossible to find a tiny and self-contained electro-therapy unit suitable for travel. Volosano combines smart retractable cable system, simple usage, and compact design making it your perfect travel companion at hand.

 

Simply put the electrodes on designated acupoints. Volosano works by sending microcurrent pulses to stimulate your body re-balancing, as well as, your fatigue, ache and pain relief.

 

 

* * * * * *

Every tissue in the human body has a unique electrical frequency, which gets disrupted by injury or disease. Microcurrent therapy restores the normal frequencies and mimicking the natural electrical frequency of our tissues, which helps in nerve and muscle pain relief. Recent clinical trial by Kelly et al. (2017) in patient with the history of chronic neck pain showed 80% relieve by using the microcurrent stimulation at acupuncture points.

Our device is based on the same principle using advanced technology to deliver the current stimulation. A user-friendly software has been developed for guiding the placement of electrodes at acupuncture points. Therefore, it can be used by all the age groups without the help of a medical or acupuncture physician and we hope to get 80-90% efficacy for pain relief.

~ Dr. Gajendra Kumar, co-founder

 

 

Acupuncture and Microcurrent therapy have been around for ages and are widely accepted as effective pain relief techniques.

Acupuncture is a form of traditional Chinese Art of Healing that has been practiced for centuries. It's based on the theory that energy, called Qi, flows through and around your body along pathways called meridians. It is believed that pain is caused when the flow of energy is blocked by something on your meridians. To unblock the meridians, acupuncturists insert small needles to restore your muscles back to their original pain free status.

Microcurrent therapy is based on the theory that the body has a natural electrical current that provides intercellular communications through electromagnetic signaling. When we have an injury, this signal is disrupted or diminished. Low frequency microcurrent therapy helps to restore the electromagnetic field back to normal, thus allowing the injured cells to repair themselves.

 

Volosano has brought these two theories together. By placing our electrodes on acupuncture points you can experience the pain relieving powers derived from both Eastern and Western healing arts. 

The tricky part about both of these theories is for users to know where to apply the microcurrent or acupuncture needles. We make this simple through the Volosano App.

The Volosano App guides you through the placement of electrodes, duration of treatment, and comes pre-loaded with custom designed treatment programs. All you need to do is plug in your micSTICK™ and you will be on your way to a pain free travel. 

 

 

 

     

 

Our strategic partner, Elytone Electronics Company Limited has been one of the leading manufacturers in audio and medical devices for over 35 years. Their facilities in USA, Taiwan and China fully comply with the FDA's strict GMP requirements and has been ISO registered for 20 years.

Our global team is comprised of experienced electronic manufacturers, professionals in electro-therapy, therapists in pain management, user experience designers, and supply chain experts with more than 15 years of entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience, so rest assured Volosano will exceed your expectations.

We are perfectionists! We have done our homework. Volosano is now at its sixth version in design, so the risks are minimal. We have identified and locked in our manufacturers who have been years in the medical industry for the best quality assurance.

As it launches, the final product will impress as a quality therapeutic companion. We are also developing the best version of the cable recoil winding system to further enhance the user experience. 

To assure our promises, we have already begun the ISO13485 qualification and FDA application preparation, which is one of the most important variable factors in the perk delivery to the US and EU. We will continue working hard in this area to guarantee on-time delivery.

Why do I need Volosano on the go?

Most of us have experienced some sort of discomfort on an airplane, especially when stuck in economy class for a transatlantic flight from London to New York, or beyond. Such journeys are no pleasures by any measures.

This is the reason for us to develop micSTICK™ for travelers. Being your personal travel therapist on the go, its pre-installed custom therapy and relaxation programs can bring you instant relief in specific travel fatigue, aches and stiff muscle relief for Neck, Shoulder, Lower Back and Joints, whenever and wherever you are.

How does it work?

By applying microcurrent to the injured sites, your body will be able to register the signal to activate the regeneration process right away because Volosano simply restores the normal frequencies within your cells, which results in a remarkable improvement in pain, inflammation and function.

When do I need to replace the Electrode Pads ?

This depends on many factors, such as skin sensitivity, natural oil production and comfort, just to name a few. However, each set is recommended for about 15 treatments on average. Or, until they are no longer sticky.

Are there any side effects in using Volosano?

No, electro-therapy itself is not something new and has been proved as a safe, natural and effective way in alleviating pain for long. Clinical Studies on low frequency microcurrent electro-therapy indicate that side effects exist in less than 1% of people.   

Do I still need to take drugs or portions?

This is a 100% drug free pain management option. No other fix.

How does it feel?

You feel no sensations or just a slight tingling feeling as microcurrent works at a level close to your own body's natural electrical level.

What are the differences between Microcurrent and TENS therapy?

Microcurrent is one millionth of an ampere current, which resembles our own body current. TENS is milli-current, i.e. one thousandth of an ampere, which is one thousand times stronger than microcurrent. TENS is commonly used to suppress pain, whereas microcurrent aides in the fix of the root cause.

Is anyone not suitable to use Volosano?

Volosano is not recommended for people with a metal pacemaker or a heart rhythm issue, pregnancy or under 12.

Do I need to change battery or re-charge the battery?

Volosano is powered by smart phone via 3.5 audio port. It does not contain battery so no charging is required.

Does Volosano use a lot of power?

No. The consumption of power from the audio jack is just like playing a song with your headphone, as it is designed with a passive electronic board so only minimal power is used during treatments.

How do I know where to place the electrode pads?

Each treatment program on the Volosano App shows you the designated acupoints to place electrodes on with an interactive body diagram. You may also check with our consultants anytime for details if required. 

Is it difficult to set up?

It is pretty simple. All treatments on App are designed by therapists and Chinese medicine practitioners for targeted pain or discomfort. All you need to do is turn the App on, set it up with your custom program, and save it as your favorite program(s). Every time you plug the Volosano in, just press START and sit back.

Where can I use it? 

You can use it anytime and anywhere you like. It is Small, Discreet and TSA friendly. 

What kind of aches and discomfort can Volosano help to mitigate?

Volosano comes pre-installed with treatments for Neck, Shoulder, Lower back, Joints aches and Stress management. As your needs change, you can upgrade the App by adding in other new treatments offered by us.

Do I need to seek doctor advice before using Volosano?

No, it is a FDA approved device for personal use.

Where can I seek help if the unit is not working well with me?

Feel free to drop us a note anytime. Our professional team will respond in 24 working hours.

How long would it take for the pain to be alleviated?

Treatment results will vary. Long term relief may take several sessions but most of our beta users reported their pain and discomfort alleviated even in the first treatment.

It is Small, Discreet and TSA friendly. What kind of aches and discomfort can Volosano help to mitigate?Volosano comes pre-installed with treatments for Neck, Shoulder, Lower back, Joints aches and Stress management. As your needs change, you can upgrade the App by adding in other new treatments offered by us.Do I need to seek doctor advice before using Volosano?No, it is a FDA approved device for personal use.Where can I seek help if the unit is not working well with me?Feel free to drop us a note anytime. Our professional team will respond in 24 working hours.How long would it take for the pain to be alleviated? Treatment results will vary. Long term relief may take several sessions but most of our beta users reported their pain and discomfort alleviated even in the first treatment.

story:
I have been building espresso machines since 1993, one at a time each machine signed and numbered for each customer. I have followed the trend in my profession from semiautomatic, automatic, programmable digital electronics but in my mind I keep going back to the original spring lever machine. The original machines ran on propane and that is what I want to do to mobilize their use.

Braising the Boiler for a 2 group spring lever

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The spring lever machines will take longer to produce and require the new equipment but the machines were made by me and other than a lot of time and labor they are completed and work beautifully, but I could not scale up and manufacture  them as a product made this way.

My goal is to be able to offer this beautiful spring lever machine to many people by automating the frame, boiler and body production with my new equipment while still keeping it handcrafted.

As seen in the main production video, we first start by fabricating the frames by cutting the steel, then bending then welding. The frame is then bead blasted and powder coated. The feet are machined and mounted on the frame. The next step is the boilers, the 4" copper tubing is cut, deburred, the 1/2" solid brass for the top and bottom of the boiler is machined then braised to each end of the boiler. The heating element is attached to the boiler and the boiler is mounted on the frame. Now the Spring Lever Group is mounted as well as the steam and hot valves with anti-burn stainless wands and also and the pump in the water reservoir machine, no pump is needed in the plumb in version. All the copper tubing which are 1/4 and 3/8 are hand bent and put on the frame to run to the pump, boiler, group and valves, lastly the electrical components are wired. This entire procedure is done by hand and in house except for the powder coating.

The machine is tested. During this entire process while the body case is fabricated and the style and material used depends on the model.

 

 

Pictures of some perks

 

A beautiful handcrafted by Salvatore GRINDER, micrometrical adjustment, doserless with a tamper and stainless steel tray 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 The Lever Group up close

 

 

 

 

 

The Book

 

The Crema

story:
From the creators of The Adjustable Bag, a revolutionary convertible bag that was successfully founded in Kickstarter earlier this year, comes a brannew product - just as functional, but different. Enjoy.

Say hello to The Adjustable Backpack! The first real multi-size backpack in the world as it can double in size.

The Adjustable Backpack is a small, medium and large backpack all in one. With the ability to transform into three completely different sizes, it's the only backpack you need.

 

>>>UPDATES

We've recently updated some details on The Adjustable Backpack. These updates include a removable waist belt, a quick access zip pocket on the left strap, and attachment loops on the pockets. We want to make this bag as functional as possibly while still maintaining its simplicity and elegance.

The Adjustable Backpack is extremely easy to use. It expands or contracts through a patent pending cinch design. There's no other bag in the world that can expand so much (double's in size) - so quickly.

The Adjustable Backpack can transition between:  Small: 31L / 31x31x41cm / 12.2x12.2.x16.15"  Medium: 46.5L / 31x31x61.5cm / 12.2x12.2x24.2"   Large: 62L / 31x31x82cm / 12.2x12.2x32.3"

 

With The Adjustable Backpack you'll never need another backpack ever again. It's size versatility allows it adjust to fit your different occasions.

FOR THE CITY

It's perfect for every day use and commuting. It is simple, elegant, and modern. 

 

 

WEEKEND TRIPS

The Adjustable Backpack is also perfect for weekend trips, recreational adventures, and excursions. It's durable micro-ribbed 900D nylon will always keep your things safe and dry.

 

TRAVELLING / EXCURSION

It's also perfect for longer travels, thanks to its 62L capacity when fully expanded.

 

When designing The Adjustable Backpack we took great care to design every detail of the bag so that it is simple yet extremely functional. The design looks minimal and sleek, works extremely well, and is made to last.

 

Introducing 3Pouch, a small, large, and double-compartment pouch - all in one. Following Piorama's product line of versatile and convertible products, 3Pouch is one pouch with 3 different configurations.

As with The Adjustable Bag and The Adjustable Backpack, 3Pouch uses an extremely simple cinch system to transition between its different configurations. It's quick and easy to use.

3Pouch can transition between 5, 10, and 15 liters. It also allows you to safely separate your clean clothes from your not-so-clean clothes.

3Pouch will be available in three different colors that will brighten up the interior of any Piorama bag.

We'd like to announce our new stretch goal which will be unlocked at $60,000. Only ONE new color will be offered. This will be chosen through a vote at the end of our campaign.

Which color will it be?

 We're excited to see which color will win!

 

We are Piorama, the creators of The Adjustable Bag and now The Adjustable Backpack. In a world that can often get too complicated, we admire products that help simplify our lives, and believe in the idea that less can often be more.

.

.

.

follow us @

www.instagram.com/piorama.co

www.facebook.com/theadjustablebag

connect with us @

hello@piorama.co

www.piorama.co

story:
Retractable Key Chain 

 

We combined our Passion for Traveling and Sustainable Solar Energy to create Numi. With Numi our main purpose is to make sure travellers get the most out of each journey by helping them stay fully charged, safe and organised on the road. 

At SET we are striving to show people the benefits of Solar Energy and we want to inspire them to integrate it in other parts of their life and become part of a valuable community that uses and promotes sustainability in their every day life. Because small changes eventually add up to huge results.

Founder: Elaha Rafie 

Designer: David Dos Santos 

Making life better by stripping down products to their bare essence, with a focus on functionality, durability and aesthetics. Studio Dos Santos creates gorgeous looking smart designs, meeting tomorrow’s demands.

‘’Products that make life better are the only ones making sense,’’ says Studio Dos Santos owner David Dos Santos.

‘’Simplicity is key in a world full of distractions, so we strip products down to their essence: great functionality and minimalistic aesthetics. ‘’This approach has gained Dos Santos multiple design awards and collaborations with leading brands, such as Coca Cola, Ikea and Maxi-Cosi/Dorel.

When designing, Studio Dos Santos’ starting point is the end user. ‘’We develop our products with their stories in mind: to accomplish a better user experience, great products need to contain emotional elements, creating a connection with its owner. This also leads to a higher return on investment’’.

Risks and challenges

Challenges and unforeseen events are part of every business, including ours. However, we have prepared ourselves the best we can. 
We have a very good relationship with our manufacturer and we already have finished prototypes which means that directly after our Kickstarter campaign we can start the production and deliver the backpacks as soon as possible. We work together with an experienced transportation company and we have already taken care of everything that needs to be ready before we can start shipping like documents, certificates etc. 
We will work hard every day to ensure that your Numi Packs will arrive as fast as possible. 
Thanks for being part of our community and believing in us.

story:
The trip of a lifetime...

Ryan is one of 4 students from Uplands College in South Africa invited to attend a World View Challenge in India in September 2014. The outcome of this trip is for learners to be exposed to a culture and country which is very different to Africa, and to stimulate thinking on worldview questions... What is truth or reality? Who am I? What is society? Why is there suffering? Can I be a World Changer?

What We Need...

All travel and accommodation costs are covered. We just need to cover his flights and visa cost which amount to $1,500.

story:
Short Summary

Westhollow Society is a non-profit that exists to help improve and give identity to the Northwest Dallas communities through beautification, culture, and community.

We need signage on the Park Forest neighborhood to promote a brand and identity that currently does not exist for Park Forest.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $2600 to install all of the signs (the cost for installation is about $1000) and to manufacture the signs (the cost for making them is about $1600). The remainder is used to pay fees taken by indigogo and PayPal (about 4% and PayPal 4%).

If we do not reach our entire goal, no funds will be retained.

I began researching the costs involved in getting street signs for Park Forest about a year or so ago. I got quotes and counted and listed all of the needed signage for street sign toppers in the neighborhood. It would only cost about $11/household for there to be street signs at the top of every intersection in our neighborhood and entry to our neighborhood.

IF WE DO NOT RAISE ALL OF THE FUNDS, ALL FUNDS PLEDGED WILL BE REFUNDED BY INDIEGOGO.   FUNDS CHARGED WILL BE KEPT ONLY IF WE REACH THE NEEDED FUNDS TO PURCHASE THE SIGNS.

Any funds that remain after purchasing and installing the signs and paying fees will be donated to the Park Forest Crime Watch organization by Westhollow Society.  

The Sign 

I designed the sign and I think it differentiates our neighborhood from those around us. We have a mid-century neighborhood and primarily ranches/etc. from that era. I think this captures the era and gives our neighborhood an "identity" and "Brand" that we currently do no posses

It is shaped like a mid century ranch with a chimney at the top with the development established date. It's better than the typical boring oval or square signs you may see (like in Northaven Park across Marsh) etc. Also, it is something people will remember seeing and that will be associated in their minds with Park Forest.   It will help people to know where Park Forest is and "put it on the map" so to speak. It will help to raise its cache among the city residents as well.

I have already had it approved by the City of Dallas streets department, so we only need to have them made to move forward.

Like I said only $11/sign is very low.

We only have 60 days to raise all of the needed funds!  Let's make this happen!

story:
MINIMAL DESIGN

Pen Uno is a most minimal pen designed to be both a pleasure to write with and beautiful to see. With only 5.3mm (7/32in) in diameter it is one of the slimmest pens ever manufactured, yet it is very comfortable to use because its holding barrel is slightly wider. This barrel also serves as a twisting cap that protects the pen tip when not in use. Pen Uno is precision-machined out of space-grade aluminum and anodized in four distinct colors: space grey, silver, gold, and rose gold. A fifth exclusive color in black is also available at certain reward levels.

Pen Uno uses the widely available Hi-Tec-C Coleto gel ink cartridge. This cartridge writes exactly the same as the regular Hi-Tec-C cartridge but it is much slimmer in diameter because it was designed for a multi-color pen system. Taking advantage of this super slim cartridge we were able to construct what we believe is one of the most minimal pens ever designed.

WRITING EXPERIENCE

In this video we show how the pen writes and the overall writing experience.

MECHANISM

The holding barrel doubles as twisting cap to protect the pen tip when not in use. A few turns of the cap will reveal the pen to be ready to write.

When not in use you can close the twisting cap to protect the tip.

COLORS

Pen Uno is anodized in five subtle and elegant colors (dark grey, gold, silver, rose gold, and red). A special edition pen in black will be included when you get four pens.

Silver

Gold

Rose Gold

Space Grey

Red

Black (exclusive)

COMPONENTS

The pen consists of four main components: the main shaft, holding barrel, end cap, and ink cartridge (Hi-Tec-C Coleto). The end cap of the pen can be removed using a flat head screwdriver to change the ink cartridge. You can also use any other flat object or even your nail.

INK CARTRIDGE

Pen Uno is designed to use the Hi-Tec-C Coleto gel ink cartridge which comes in a variety of colors and it is very inexpensive and widely available in stationary stores as well as online retailers like Amazon. The cartridge is very slim because it was designed for a multi-color pen system. We used that in our advantage to create a super thin pen. Hi-Tec-C Coleto cartridges come in 0.3, 0.4, and 0.5mm pen tips (the same sizes as the standard Hi-Tec-C).

SIZE COMPARISON

A comparison of Pen Uno with widely available pens. From top to bottom:  Pilot's Hi-Tec-C, Pilot's G-2, Steadler's Liquid Point, and Sharpie.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • All aluminum construction (anodized)
  • Length: 13cm (5 1/8in)
  • Width: 5.3mm (7/32in)
  • Weight: 10g (similar to a standard pencil)

WE NEED YOUR HELP!!!

After one year of research and tens of self-funded prototypes we need your help to place our first production order with our manufacturer. This is an exciting time as good design can go directly from designers to consumers. We hope you can give us the opportunity to make this pen for you.

REWARDS

$35
1X Pen Uno (color of choice)
($10 off retail price of $45)

$65
2X Pen Uno (colors of choice)
($25 off retail price of $90)

$125
4X Pen Uno (colors of choice) + free black pen
($55 off retail price of $180 + free black pen)

BACKGROUND

Ensso is a small design studio established in 2014 in Los Angeles, California. The studio is run by two designers trained as architects. Our main goal is to rethink everyday objects and transform them into beautiful pieces that inspire our world. The studio has received several recognitions including the Red Dot award, the Good Design Award, and the ICFF award.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have been working on this pen for more than a year. Through this time we have pinned down every design detail and manufacturing process. We have produced tens of prototypes which have helped us to better understand every aspect of the product. The pen is now ready for production and we have secured a top of the line manufacturer that specializes in precision metal components.

Our main challenge is to achieve our funding goal and be able to place our first production order. Your help is essential and we will be very grateful.

Please let us know if you have any questions. We are looking forward to creating this pen for you!

story:
About

Say goodbye to ice runs! The Chiller packs freezing gel inside its walls, creating an icy chamber around your beverages.

The Chiller’s Pack, Tote, or Pack Plus, paired with The Chiller, is your ultraportable beverage cooling system. Avoid the inevitability of melting ice so you can enjoy all of life’s greatest adventures.

Cool your room temperature drinks without the use of ice; The Chiller cools your favorite drinks up to 20 degrees per hour. When used with The Chiller’s Pack, The Chiller can keep your drinks cold for up to 24 hours.

Save time and money — never stop at the store for ice to fill your cooler again. Purchase The Chiller’s Pack just once, and it pays for itself!

 

 

The Chiller can hold your favorite drinks such as beer cans, soda cans, beer bottles, wine bottles and spirits.

Each Chiller fits three cans/bottles or one 750 ml to 1L wine or spirit bottle at a time.

*For advanced chilling, add new drinks to The Chiller as you consume them.

 

 

The Chiller’s Pack is smaller than most backpack coolers, making it the ultimate portable beverage cooling system for all of your favorite outdoor adventures.

The Chiller weighs just 3.2 lbs., and The Chiller’s Pack weighs just 1.5 lbs.

 

The Chiller’s Pack comes with top and back access, as well as a front zip compartment and side drink holders. It’s designed to transport a Chiller plus a 6-pack of cans or 3 bottles of wine. You can load bottles from the top and cans from the side, so you’re ready for whatever life throws at you.

The best products are created by inventors to solve a problem they face themselves, and our ‘Chill’ products are no different. Here’s our story about how we came up with the idea for The Chiller, The Chiller’s Pack and The Chiller’s Tote.

From our extensive experience enjoying drinks outdoors, we noticed a persistent problem that everyone experiences - too many beverage cooling options with one big melting ingredient... ice. "Carry a bulky cooler, and fill it with frozen water," they said. "Get two bags of ice because they will be half melted by the time you load the cooler," they said.

We had enough of struggling with and watching others struggle with bulky coolers. So we decided to re-invent portable cooling. The Chiller was our breakthrough - it is easily transportable on any adventure and provides all of the comforts of a nice cold one without any of the hassle. Now you can say goodbye to your heavy ice chest and melted ice (Rest In Puddle!).

So be free to pursue the chillest vibes and enjoy the coldest drinks, no matter how formidable the terrain may be. Wherever your day takes you - from sunny beaches to mountain trails to golf courses or grassy parks - you deserve to have a nice cold one whenever and wherever you want it. Cheers!

 

 

Chill.Systems was founded out of ‘necessity’ by a pair of weekend enthusiasts, Chase and Brian. We became friends in college at the University of Southern California, working together at a safe-ride service and pursuing business degrees. We moved to San Francisco in 2014, becoming roommates and beginning our careers - Chase in sales at Google and Brian in finance at Apple.

In 2016 we attended a BYOB music festival in San Francisco, and couldn’t help but notice people struggling with traditional coolers. We thought there had to be a better way to chill on the go - and that night the idea for Chill.Systems was born. We went through many rounds of prototypes to perfect The Chiller, and developed The Chiller’s Packs to enhance its’ cooling power and portability. With our system, you can now enjoy your favorite beverage, cold, and on the go. It’s hassle-free and best of all, ice-free! We can’t wait for you to try it for yourself!

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us to bring these ‘Chill’ products to market!

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge - so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase one of our products, if you’re a chiller at heart, you can help us spread the word on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & Reddit. Thank you!
story_txt:
About

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 



Say goodbye to ice runs! The Chiller packs freezing gel inside its walls, creating an icy chamber around your beverages.
The Chiller’s Pack, Tote, or Pack Plus, paired with The Chiller, is your ultraportable beverage cooling system. Avoid the inevitability of melting ice so you can enjoy all of life’s greatest adventures.
 




 

 

 

 
Cool your room temperature drinks without the use of ice; The Chiller cools your favorite drinks up to 20 degrees per hour. When used with The Chiller’s Pack, The Chiller can keep your drinks cold for up to 24 hours.
Save time and money — never stop at the store for ice to fill your cooler again. Purchase The Chiller’s Pack just once, and it pays for itself!
 

 

 
The Chiller can hold your favorite drinks such as beer cans, soda cans, beer bottles, wine bottles and spirits.
Each Chiller fits three cans/bottles or one 750 ml to 1L wine or spirit bottle at a time.
*For advanced chilling, add new drinks to The Chiller as you consume them.
 

 

 
The Chiller’s Pack is smaller than most backpack coolers, making it the ultimate portable beverage cooling system for all of your favorite outdoor adventures.
The Chiller weighs just 3.2 lbs., and The Chiller’s Pack weighs just 1.5 lbs.
 

 

 
The Chiller’s Pack comes with top and back access, as well as a front zip compartment and side drink holders. It’s designed to transport a Chiller plus a 6-pack of cans or 3 bottles of wine. You can load bottles from the top and cans from the side, so you’re ready for whatever life throws at you.


 

 

 

 
The best products are created by inventors to solve a problem they face themselves, and our ‘Chill’ products are no different. Here’s our story about how we came up with the idea for The Chiller, The Chiller’s Pack and The Chiller’s Tote.
From our extensive experience enjoying drinks outdoors, we noticed a persistent problem that everyone experiences - too many beverage cooling options with one big melting ingredient... ice. "Carry a bulky cooler, and fill it with frozen water," they said. "Get two bags of ice because they will be half melted by the time you load the cooler," they said.
We had enough of struggling with and watching others struggle with bulky coolers. So we decided to re-invent portable cooling. The Chiller was our breakthrough - it is easily transportable on any adventure and provides all of the comforts of a nice cold one without any of the hassle. Now you can say goodbye to your heavy ice chest and melted ice (Rest In Puddle!).
So be free to pursue the chillest vibes and enjoy the coldest drinks, no matter how formidable the terrain may be. Wherever your day takes you - from sunny beaches to mountain trails to golf courses or grassy parks - you deserve to have a nice cold one whenever and wherever you want it. Cheers!
 

 
Chill.Systems was founded out of ‘necessity’ by a pair of weekend enthusiasts, Chase and Brian. We became friends in college at the University of Southern California, working together at a safe-ride service and pursuing business degrees. We moved to San Francisco in 2014, becoming roommates and beginning our careers - Chase in sales at Google and Brian in finance at Apple.
In 2016 we attended a BYOB music festival in San Francisco, and couldn’t help but notice people struggling with traditional coolers. We thought there had to be a better way to chill on the go - and that night the idea for Chill.Systems was born. We went through many rounds of prototypes to perfect The Chiller, and developed The Chiller’s Packs to enhance its’ cooling power and portability. With our system, you can now enjoy your favorite beverage, cold, and on the go. It’s hassle-free and best of all, ice-free! We can’t wait for you to try it for yourself!
 

 
We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us to bring these ‘Chill’ products to market!
We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge - so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase one of our products, if you’re a chiller at heart, you can help us spread the word on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & Reddit. Thank you!

story:
The campaign is finished and we are in demand now!

Thank you so much, our backers!

We can not go this far without you guys support!

THANK YOU! 

 

                 As you can see, now we are in demand. You still can purchase MAX PUMP

       on this website.  If you have any questions about the products and other issues,

       please feel free to contact us by facebook(search "flextailoutdoors“) or email

    （service@flextailgear.com）. We'd love to answer all your questions.

 

    

    

 

 

       Since we finished our campaign, we received a lot of feedbacks from our backers.

We are honored to share it with you!

We are honored to share it with you. 

Here Is A Review by 'RAFFLE&REVIEW'

Watch here:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DXjGoP041Qw

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

     


     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Why not share good things with your friends? If you share our Indiegogo campaign on your Facebook, Twitter or google+, and it brings one of your friends contribute to our campaign, we will send you a FREE Orange Color ！

    The one click button is on the right of the video and we can track it from Indiegogo dashboard.You can share as many times as you want.

     

     

     

     

    For an even better outdoor experience, we have also designed the professional  FLEXTAIL air sleeping pad. This extra-light and extremely comfortable mattress can be inflated with MAX pump within one minute.

    Get your portable FLEXTAIL bed for a fabulous outdoor experience. 

     

     

    1. How to deflate with MAX PUMP?

    There is a deflate nozzle in the box with MAX PUMP. When you want to deflate som air product, like the vacuum bags we provided, please mount the nozzle to the top of MAX PUMP. And then attach the pump to your lifebuoy or air mattress. Finally, open the switch on the side of the pump body.

    2.How long can MAX PUMP be fully charged？

    About 5 to 6 hours. 

    3.What payment options do I have?

    You can pay by credit card or PayPal. Select a Perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.

    4.I have some unique inflatable products, but the mouth don't match, what should I do?

    Contact us by email("service@flextailgear.com" or any email related to the "flextailgear.com" ) or Facebook("https://www.facebook.com/flextailoutdoors/"). Send us your gadget photo, and we will give you our solution.

    PS：Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

     

     

    Want to sell MAX PUMP at your stores?

    Awesome!Just email us with your info.

    leon@flextailgear.com

    Leon( Flextail's Co-Founder)

     

    Coming from the same university, we joined together as we shared the same passion for the great outdoors. Together, our team has over 15 years of outdoor experience. We aim at designing more practical outdoor products and to share our ideas with everyone in the world who loves life.

story:
Tsubasa V3: a solar powerd drone under 250g for 3DMapping

About us
ProjectEMS is a reality that work with innovation linked to the use of drones. Actually winning some prizes such as Gaetano Marzotto 2014 - "Premio dall'idea all'impresa", ProjectEMS is one of 22 winners of residence and coaching path. Expanding in its sector, ProjectEMS offers consulting services to business users, public institutions and to private users.

Why 250g?
Because in Italy a drone in this weight class (equal or under 300g) can fly almost anywhere if you properly follow the rules. This is a campaign primarily for Italy, but we wanted to make it compresbile and usable for everyone around the world. We are proud to say that we can ship all over the world!

In Italy the rules are the following:
Where you can fly drones within 250 grams?
(300 grams is the actual category for Italy)
-in all operational scenarios except as explained in the following list
-at max 500 meters away and 150 in height outside CTR and ATZ
-at max 200 meters away and 70 of height in CTR
-at max 30 meters in height to the areas below the take-off and landing trajectories

Where you can not fly drones within 250 grams?
(300 grams is the actual category for Italy)
-inside the ATZ
-inside active regulated zones and inside the forbidden zone
-above the critical infrastructures
-above gatherings of people

Italian version here.

And if I am not in Italy?
Most countries have a simplified regulations for drones under 250g. Check the drones regulations of your country to understand if in your country have rules-simplifications for the drones in this category.

About 3DMapping
The 3D mapping is a technology that allows you to create a three-dimensional view of a place on a computer screen. This technology is primarily used to create three-dimensional reproductions of points or objects on a map.
Those listed below are just a few examples of current applications of 3D Mapping:
     - Establishment and maintenance of 3D maps
     - Checking for any damage caused by disasters
     - Creation of virtual 3D models
     - Identification of activities to be carried out on land
     - Structural surveys of buildings
     - Survey of artistic and architectural heritage
     - Control of the state of archaeological and environmental sites


 

....something is changed....
....additional information coming soon....

story:
"Your phone won’t help you when aliens invade Earth, but the Spare Me 8 in 1 Rescue Tool will." - Mechanics Hub 
 

"Made of glass-filled nylon resin, this tool can help you in many ways whenever your car get stuck somewhere. The Spare Me rescue tool can assist you when digging, act as traction aids, a window scraper, and a tire lever. It also includes a flashlight, a seat belt cutter, and a glass breaker. (As you’ll see in the video, it can also work as a self-defense tool. Which is pretty neat.)"
- The Mechanic Doctor 

"I got hold of one and let me tell you, this thing is in my Jeep and it's staying there for when I know I'll need it... The Spare Me is designed to help drivers of all levels resolve emergencies on the road including flat tires, getting stuck in mud, and even getting out of ice and snow." -Superesse Straps 

 

"Anyone who lives in an area prone to snow will know how important it is to have a shovel and ice scraper in the car. Thing is, those two tools might not be enough to dig you out of a properly tricky situation. The solution might lie in the Spare-Me, a compact five-in-one tool designed to help drivers get moving again... It looks simple, but the Spare-Me promises to punch above its weight." -New Atlas 
 

"[T]he Spare Me 5-in-1 Auto Rescue Tool is a disaster-averting little hand-held tool that you shouldn’t ever go driving without... A complete necessity for cars that do off-roading, and even for areas in the desert or prone to heavy blizzards, the Spare Me may just spare you a call to AAA!"

-Yanko Design 

 

David Wahlman's Photography - Video Review

 

How It All Started

We created Spare Me after watching a car mechanic lift a spare tire with his foot while changing a tire. We decided to invent an automotive tool that was safe, easy to use and effective in multiple situations (and didn't require you to use any body parts!).

The Original: Spare Me 5 in 1

Through a successful crowdfunding campaign, the Spare Me 5 in 1 was born. We equipped it with five versatile features: Lift, Leverage, a Scraper, a Shovel, and Traction. 

The Next Level: Spare Me 8 in 1

We're ready to make the Spare Me even more effective -- and we need your help! Adding a discrete 3 in 1 cap, the Spare Me 8 in 1 will feature a Flashlight, Glass breaker, and Seatbelt Cutter.

Now the Spare Me can help you beyond automotive repair; it can really help you in an emergency -- even an alien invasion. Here you can check our full story:

 

Check out some of Spare Me features!

 Spare Me Rescue Tool - Leverage
 Spare Me Rescue Tool - Lift
 Spare Me Rescue Tool - Shovel & Traction
 Spare Me Rescue Tool - Scraper

 

 

Thank you!

We appreciate your support in helping us get the Spare Me 8 in 1 into the hands of every driver. Be sure to share our campaign page with your friends and colleagues, follow us on social media, and oh yeah -- watch out for those aliens.

Follow us on

story:
We all call America "Home", but how much do we all REALLY know about our home. Starting June 1st, I'd like to find out as much as I can about every region of the US, and even Canada. I'll be illustrating my findings though my love of cars and photography. My goal is to find out what living in the US means to everyone dispersed throughout the various states. I want to make personal connections that may end up lasting a lifetime, and share those connections and stories with all of backers and supporters. 

 My blog can be seen at: http://maxandhismiatatakearoadtrip.wordpress.com/

Previous photos I've taken can be seen at:

https://www.flickr.com/photos/maxkarg/sets/

And to learn more about me, you can visit: 

http://about.me/Max_Karg

story:
Ever wish you could seamlessly capture -- and review -- what's happening on the road in real-time? Now you can. Meet the VAVA Dash Cam, the most versatile car dash camera yet. Built from the result of hundreds of conversations with REAL drivers, the VAVA Dash Cam was designed for the everyday driver to do and see more on the road – all while providing greater safety and ease of use.

Here's What You Get: 

  • Crystal-clear footage in 1080p HD quality at 60 f/ps
  • Always recording and auto-saves footage of sudden braking and unexpected impact with a built-in G-sensor
  • VAVA Dash Cam mobile app to seamlessly review and transfer footage -- no fumbling with SD cards or cables needed
  • 140-degree field of vision (covers five lanes) 
  • Built-in GPS to log/track trips
  • Snapshot for remote captures 
  • Captures footage even when your car is off -- parking mode that works for up to 30 days*

*when used with VAVA's proprietary charger -- the VAVA Dash Cam Charger

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Always Prepared on the Road

From recording accidents to documenting road trips, there are more and more reasons to own a dash camera. With the VAVA Dash Cam, we set out to create a feature-packed solution that covers them all based on feedback from REAL drivers. 

We set out to equip every driver with everything they needed to stay prepared on the road. Our proprietary hardware sets your camera in standby mode when parked, and our VAVA Dash Cam mobile app keeps you tuned in so you can review and share footage in real-time with just a tap! Always have the documentation you need on hand with the VAVA Dash Cam. 

Crystal-Clear 1080p HD Videos, Day and Night

Note that videos play in default at 720P, to see in 1080p, go to this link and make sure to select 1080p HD from settings

Note that videos play in default at 720P, to see in 1080p, go to this link and make sure to select 1080p HD from settings

Not everyone belongs on the road and unfortunately, all it takes is one bad driver to ruin your day. But the next time you get into an accident, there’s a better alternative to playing the blame game: reviewing clear and dependable video footage. With the VAVA Dash Cam, a Sony IMX 291 image sensor is paired with 6 glass lenses and an infrared lens for crystal-clear images, even in low-light settings. The result is highly detailed 1080p full HD videos at 60 frames-per-second both night and day.

A Full-Featured VAVA Dash Cam Mobile App

See and do more with the VAVA Dash Cam mobile app. With a built-in GPS module and a VAVA Dash  Cam app (designed for iOS and Android), the VAVA Dash Cam has plenty for the road trip enthusiast. Review and transfer footage, edit your photos, and share to social networks with ease straight from the VAVA Dash Cam app -- no cords needed. 

Automatic Footage Transfer

Free your footage with the VAVA Dash Cam app, and review and transfer the footage you need in seconds, not hours. When paired with VAVA Dash Cam's dedicated WiFi channel, footage is transferred wirelessly from your TF/microSD card to your phone so you'll always have the videos and images you need on hand.* No computers, manual transfers, or cables needed.

*no data is consumed during this process

Do More With Your Footage

 

Review, edit, and share footage directly on screen. No more scrolling through thumbnails on a computer or having to worry about transferring footage.

Create Your Own Trip Logs

 

Capture and track your trips with VAVA Dash Cam's built-in GPS module. Create and access trip logs with ease, along with footage captured on each route.

Automatic Crash Recording

 

It only takes seconds for an accident to happen and often you won’t even see it coming. But the VAVA Dash will, thanks to a smart 3-axis G-sensor that measures the movement of your vehicle. When any unexpected braking or impact is detected, the Dash will automatically create a video recording that starts from 5 seconds before the incident even occurred.


30 Day Standby When Parked With the VAVA Dash Cam Charger

 

 

Sometimes the most dangerous place for your car is when it's parked. Maybe that other driver left a note when he bumped into your car. Maybe there’s security footage available that shows what happened. Or maybe you can find out for sure with the VAVA Dash Cam. Paired with a proprietary 2300mAh power bank, the VAVA Dash Cam can stay in parking mode for up to 30 days with G-sensor-activated recordings continuing to take place.

 

Swivel 360° to Capture Any Angle 

Simplicity meets flexibility with the VAVA Dash Cam -- swivel 360° to capture footage in front, on the side, and even inside the car. 

 

Wide Angle Lens

Cover up to 5 car lanes with a 140° wide-angle lens and built-in microphone.  It’s easier than ever to capture whatever grabs your attention – including carpool karaoke singing moments.

 


One Touch Snapshots

Capture photos and videos on your own terms with a remote you can stick anywhere. Whether it’s a beautiful sunset or a crazy insurance fraudster, never miss a moment on the road with the VAVA Dash Cam. 

 

 

 

Capture must-see moments in the blink of an eye

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your VAVA Dash Cam, Protected

 

Each VAVA Dash Cam comes with an industry-leading 18 months of warranty protection. Get another 12 months of warranty when you register your product!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Born from Award-winning Design

At VAVA, we bring meaningful innovation to modern lifestyles. From award-winning speakers to one-stop car camera solutions, our products improve lives with ideas that can be shared and enjoyed by the whole family. 

 

 

We're proud to partner with Y Studios, our design partner behind the VAVA Dash Cam.
