With the VAVA Dash Cam, we set out to create a feature-packed solution that covers them all based on feedback from REAL drivers. We set out to equip every driver with everything they needed to stay prepared on the road. Our proprietary hardware sets your camera in standby mode when parked, and our VAVA Dash Cam mobile app keeps you tuned in so you can review and share footage in real-time with just a tap! Always have the documentation you need on hand with the VAVA Dash Cam. Crystal-Clear 1080p HD Videos, Day and NightNote that videos play in default at 720P, to see in 1080p, go to this link and make sure to select 1080p HD from settingsNote that videos play in default at 720P, to see in 1080p, go to this link and make sure to select 1080p HD from settingsNot everyone belongs on the road and unfortunately, all it takes is one bad driver to ruin your day. But the next time you get into an accident, there’s a better alternative to playing the blame game: reviewing clear and dependable video footage. With the VAVA Dash Cam, a Sony IMX 291 image sensor is paired with 6 glass lenses and an infrared lens for crystal-clear images, even in low-light settings. The result is highly detailed 1080p full HD videos at 60 frames-per-second both night and day.A Full-Featured VAVA Dash Cam Mobile AppSee and do more with the VAVA Dash Cam mobile app. With a built-in GPS module and a VAVA Dash  Cam app (designed for iOS and Android), the VAVA Dash Cam has plenty for the road trip enthusiast. Review and transfer footage, edit your photos, and share to social networks with ease straight from the VAVA Dash Cam app -- no cords needed. Automatic Footage TransferFree your footage with the VAVA Dash Cam app, and review and transfer the footage you need in seconds, not hours. When paired with VAVA Dash Cam's dedicated WiFi channel, footage is transferred wirelessly from your TF/microSD card to your phone so you'll always have the videos and images you need on hand.* No computers, manual transfers, or cables needed.*no data is consumed during this processDo More With Your Footage Review, edit, and share footage directly on screen. No more scrolling through thumbnails on a computer or having to worry about transferring footage.Create Your Own Trip Logs Capture and track your trips with VAVA Dash Cam's built-in GPS module. Create and access trip logs with ease, along with footage captured on each route.Automatic Crash Recording It only takes seconds for an accident to happen and often you won’t even see it coming. But the VAVA Dash will, thanks to a smart 3-axis G-sensor that measures the movement of your vehicle. When any unexpected braking or impact is detected, the Dash will automatically create a video recording that starts from 5 seconds before the incident even occurred.
30 Day Standby When Parked With the VAVA Dash Cam Charger
 VAVA Dash Cam Charger Sometimes the most dangerous place for your car is when it's parked. Maybe that other driver left a note when he bumped into your car. Maybe there’s security footage available that shows what happened. Or maybe you can find out for sure with the VAVA Dash Cam. Paired with a proprietary 2300mAh power bank, the VAVA Dash Cam can stay in parking mode for up to 30 days with G-sensor-activated recordings continuing to take place. 
Swivel 360° to Capture Any Angle 
Simplicity meets flexibility with the VAVA Dash Cam -- swivel 360° to capture footage in front, on the side, and even inside the car.  Wide Angle LensCover up to 5 car lanes with a 140° wide-angle lens and built-in microphone.  It’s easier than ever to capture whatever grabs your attention – including carpool karaoke singing moments. Capture wide-angle snapshots outside -- or inside -- the car with ease
One Touch Snapshots
Capture photos and videos on your own terms with a remote you can stick anywhere. Whether it’s a beautiful sunset or a crazy insurance fraudster, never miss a moment on the road with the VAVA Dash Cam.   Capture snapshots in 1080p HD with just a click Photos with a click of a button -- no phone needed
Capture must-see moments in the blink of an eyeClip the VAVA Dash Cam phone mount to any air vent
 
            Your VAVA Dash Cam, Protected  Each VAVA Dash Cam comes with an industry-leading 18 months of warranty protection. Get another 12 months of warranty when you register your product!           Born from Award-winning DesignAt VAVA, we bring meaningful innovation to modern lifestyles. From award-winning speakers to one-stop car camera solutions, our products improve lives with ideas that can be shared and enjoyed by the whole family.   We're proud to partner with Y Studios, our design partner behind the VAVA Dash Cam.

story:
At 22 ounces, LUME is the lightest auto-grinder on the market. It’s only about the size of a bottle of water, which means you can take it anywhere easily, whether on business trips, camping trips, or even backpacking out in the wilderness.

 

At 150 lumens, LUME provides plenty of light to read by or light your way to the campfire or get up in the middle of the night to...you get the idea. It provides about 20 hours of illumination on a single charge.

But how did we get here?

While whole beans can be stored for a much longer period of time - oxidation, moisture and CO2 Depletion are only few of the many reasons why fresh grounds go stale in a very short amount of time. So keep it fresh as much as possible to have that original, rewarding flavor.

Then, you'll need beans that are ground into particles of consistent size. Now the word “consistent” is key here. Why?

When you roast potatoes, you want to cut each chunk the same size to make sure they’re cooked evenly. None overcooked, none undercooked.

For example, if you like the french press brewing method, we recommend against super fine grounds. While coarse particles get good extraction, fine particles will be over-extracted. That means a bitter tasting cup of coffee.

Most of today’s hand grinders generally have one major flaw - the burr isn’t stabilized. It rocks back and forth, creating some particles larger than the rest.

LUME grinder, on the other hand, uses a patent-pending design, that applies a stabilized conical ceramic burr to keep everything precise and even.

You’ll get the same quality grounds you get from your favorite coffee shop.

The grounds that LUME produces can be adjusted for size, but they always deliver your favorite beans the way you want them — full of rewarding flavor.

And that's LUME.

Here is a breakdown of what you'll get from your pledge. We've kept it simple and you'll get great savings from retail price - just to thank you for your support.

We started this journey more than 18 months ago and the first working prototype was successfully produced about 7 months ago. There are heaps of sweat, labor and most importantly, heart going into the LUME project. After rounds and rounds of testing and improvement LUME is finally ready for the world! 

LUME was created by a team of award-winning designers, engineers, operators and other professionals. 

We’ve spent a lot of time planning this launch. Our schedule is set and our manufacturer is lined up and ready to go. All we need is your support to initiate the first run.

Thanks for reading this, and please don’t forget to share it with your coffee-obsessed friends.  

Risks and challenges

What you see here is a fully functional pre-production model. It is very close to the final product except for a few small cosmetic tweaks.

Thanks to our own initial investment, we’re looking for your support only on the first production run.

Having a prototype minimizes the risks our backers take. That, plus the efforts of our team of professionals help to ensure a successful product and a streamlined process to make it.

That said, stuff happens. If it does, we’ll be upfront and transparent about it so you always know when your LUME is coming. 

Again, thanks for backing us — we’re thrilled to have you on this journey.

story:
Introducing Heacket

Heacket is your ultimate heated jacket, flexible and strong enough to keep you warm and comfortable in cold temperatures and tough conditions. With just one layer, powered by a heating panel with three controlled heating zones, Heacket is durable and waterproof. Whether you are skiing/hiking in the outdoors or cutting down layers in cold winter days, Heacket is the way to go.

Click to watch: https://www.facebook.com/BuzzFeedStyle/videos/1...

Click right to read the full review----- Wullie Marr,  Scottish Press Photography Awards, photographer of the year, 2016

Click right for very detail review ----- Shane MaGlaun, Senior journalist, Technabob

                                                                            -----Kristi Garced, Fashion Scoops, WWD

                         -----Marcus Cho, Highsnobiety, focusing forthcoming trends in fashion

Heacket is equipped with three controlled heating zones that are flexible enough to keep you warm in cold temperatures, and strong enough to endure tough conditions. Heacket gives you all the warmth you need in just one layer, so you can be warm and cool at the same time. While, traditional heated clothing is built with heating wire that is fragile and susceptible to damage, you can maintain your active lifestyle in the Heacket. It’s built for all conditions, all seasons and can endure whatever you throw at it. It is 50% off now! Perfect for winter outdoor events like skiing and snowing.

If you want to maintain your active lifestyle in frigid conditions, your office temperature gets uncomfortable in the winter, or you’re just looking to cut down on your layers, Heacket is the jacket for you.

Traditional heated clothing is made of fragile heating wire that is vulnerable and can’t keep up with the conditions or your lifestyle. Heacket is the most versatile all-season jacket, equipped with patented technology that makes it more efficient and more durable.

                                                                                               -----Kraig Becker, Digital Trends

   

                                                                             -----Jon Chattman, The Huffington Post

                                                              -----Richard Borg, Urbanwearables Technology

                                                                                                 ----- Alex Hernandez, Techaeris

Carbon-based soft warming (CSW) fabrics

Carbon-based Soft Warming (CSW) fabric is a specially designed material that is both flexible and strong. During even the most extreme testing conditions, the Heacket endured.

This heating wire is totally water-proof, making it 100% washable. You can even soak it in water when it is heating.

The fabric maintains its temperature in the toughest conditions. Like getting run over by a car.

We want to be even more tough! We cut the heat panel in parts when it is heating, and it will keep working well. Here you can see that superficial damage does not impact the heating system. So even if the heacket is damaged, it will still maintain its temperature in extreme outdoor conditions.

Increased heating efficiency 

This heated panel material is composed of specifically designed materials. The heating wire is sewn into the panels, making for rapid and uniform heating. Once the heating panel is activated, you will begin feeling warm in just 3 seconds.

Climate control

You can control the heating temperature zone at the touch of a button.

 

Cutting down layers/Easy to carry

Pick your style

About the team

Started in 2014, The Heacket team sought to change the heating fabric industry.  This was the beginning of the story. After two years of hard work and extensive research, the Heacket team is proud to develop the world's most durable heating fabric technique. A Shenzen based factory caught word of our heating technique and partnered with us to create a full fabrication line. With the help of crowdfunding, we hope to continue developing the Heacket, to test the market and work with all backers to improve the Heacket design, and bring this revolutionary heated jacket to the world.

   Legal Disclaimer

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. We have sent out several testing samples to famous reporters who will test them. We are confident with our product and technique. Once we can hit the goal, delivery will be no problem.

story:
Parking your bike anywhere has never been easier

 

Pedal Park's pedals contain magnets for parking against any magnetic surface. Install the included parking plates at home, or use the environment around you.

 


* Easy parking at home with our included parking plates

 


* Let the environment hang on to your bike while you take a deserved rest after a hard ride

 


* Park against your car while getting ready

 


* Park against road signs while taking short breaks

 

 

Types of Pedal Park

 

Choose from Aluminum Alloy and Plastic versions of the Pedal Park to best suit your bike and needs.

 


* Aluminum Alloy pedals, perfect for road and mountain bikes

 


* Plastic pedals, perfect for commuter and kids bikes

 


* Parking plates, two included for both versions of the Pedal Park

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Through my company Digirit, I have successfully funded and brought to market several innovative bicycle accessories (see Beam+,  Jog Mount+ and Grip+).

Like before, I only begin crowd funding once we’ve perfected our prototypes and are ready to begin production.

Pedal Park is no different, and I am confident that all perks will be delivered.

 

 

 

Pledge your support

 

Digirit is a small company with big ideas. With your support we can continue creating new and innovative cycling accessories to meet your needs.

Thank you for your support!

With your support we can continue creating new and innovative cycling accessories to meet your needs.Thank you for your support!

story:
This is G500, a new portable power station with a Li-ion battery of incredible 500Wh / 137,700mAh capacity for daily or emergency power demands.

Our vision has always been to create a power source that is clean, silent, sustainable, and portable. One so powerful that you won’t be at a loss ever again when faced with power shortages. And so advanced it includes most cutting-edge technologies in one compact body.

 

(2) x Pure Sine Wave AC Outlet (300W Max)

(2) x QC3.0 USB-A (18W Max)

(1) x QC3.0 USB-C (also known as Type-C)

(1) x Anderson Powerpole Connectors (150W Max)

(2) x 12-Volt DC Port (3A)

(1) x 12-Volt Car Port (10A)

 


 

Being extremely potent with an impressive battery capacity of 500Wh/137,700mAh and remarkably versatile with all the ports/outlets you need, G500 is a unique power supply.

Take a look at what it can power or charge:

 

There’re 3 ways to charge your G500. When wall outlets are available, you can use AC input to charge G500. This is the fastest way, which takes about 8-10 hours. If you have enough fuel, you can also use the cigarette lighter receptacle of your car to charge it while driving. With a solar panel at hand, you can charge G500 wherever you go. (We recommend you use our solar panel in the perk, but other panels are also compatible) After all, solar energy is everywhere and totally free. These 3 ways of charging work together will keep your road trips powered up all the time

Yes, modified sine wave output will get the job done in most scenarios. But there are some cases where it may cause excess heat buildup, interference or even damage to your devices. If you are using electronics with AC motors, or delicate devices like CPAP machine, acoustic audio, it is wiser to go with a pure sine wave power source. G500 is the ideal choice for the job, thanks to its built-in pure sine wave inverter.

Now you can enjoy the crisp, clean sound from your audio system!

(300W max output AC, suitable for a wide range of small appliances)

It's only with hindsight we can see that USB-C has already won. It is proved to be faster, more efficient and best of all -- flippable (so you can plug in your cord correctly every time). It soon will be seen on all your devices if not already. G500 features a QC3.0 USB-C port so you can charge your type-C devices whenever you want.

 

Besides USB-C, G500 also has 2 USB-A fast charge ports for those who are still using the traditional USB-A devices. QC3.0 charging protocol is downward compatible, which means G500 can charge any USB device you may have.

The G500 is entirely solar-chargeable. Combined with the SUAOKI 100W Solar Panel (you can find them in the perks), you'll have your own personal solar power generator and storage unit. G500 has built-in MPPT controller (Maximum Power Point Tracking Technology) which can increase your solar chargings as much as possible.

There are 2 direct DC outlets (12V/3A) on G500, which enable it to power security camera, wireless router, ADSL modem, DC light bulb, etc. It also features a 12V/10A car port for in-car devices like car refrigerator, air compressor, or portable outdoor shower. Take G500 when you go on your next RV trip, you’ll see how it is like to live an off-grid life!

 

If you need a smarter solar generator with more power, G500 is definitely the way.

The battery management system (BMS) allows G500 to perform more smartly and safely. 1) When the internal temperature is higher than 45°C or the total wattage is over 150W, the G500 will automatically turn on the cooling fan. 2) the G500 will automatically shut down if a component heats up too much. 3) The protective chip also prevents overvoltage, overcurrent, and short circuit.

From natural disasters to rodent bites, your power could go out in a flash. Fortunately, we have technology that will keep you powered up when it all goes down. Recharge on solar power, wall outlets, and 12-volt car lighter socket, G500 can be your perfect alternate power source to maintain your comforts during an emergency, keep your whole home running through a blackout with clean, sustainable energy.

Q: Who are we?

A: We’re a tech team that first started as an e-commerce company selling car accessories on Amazon. Now we’re a hardware incubator that keeps bringing the world innovative products from automotive equipments to power supply units.

 

Q: What’s in the box?

A: This is a list of the items included:

1 x SUAOKI G500 Portable Power Supply

1 x Adapter

1 x MC4 Solar Charging Cable

1 x Car Charger Cable

1 x User Manual

1 x Thank You Card

Q: Will the AC outlets work in my country?

A: G500 currently only has one version (110V, suitable for the US), but we’re making another version for Europe (220V), and it’s coming soon. You’ll be able to get the Europe version when it’s available on our Amazon store.

 

Q: How do I charge G500 with solar panels?

A: There are 2 ways to charge G500 with solar panels. 1) you can use the included MC4 Solar Charging Cable to connect to Anderson Powerpole. 2) you can also connect solar adapter (6530) to the DC input port. Both ways of charging need no external controller, thanks to the built-in MPPT charge controller.

 

Q: How often should I charge the unit?

A: To ensure a longer lifetime of G500, please charge the unit at least once in 3 months. If the screen shows battery has only one bar, please charge it in time.

You’ll be able to get the Europe version when it’s available on our Amazon store. Q: How do I charge G500 with solar panels?A: There are 2 ways to charge G500 with solar panels. 1) you can use the included MC4 Solar Charging Cable to connect to Anderson Powerpole. 2) you can also connect solar adapter (6530) to the DC input port. Both ways of charging need no external controller, thanks to the built-in MPPT charge controller. Q: How often should I charge the unit?A: To ensure a longer lifetime of G500, please charge the unit at least once in 3 months. If the screen shows battery has only one bar, please charge it in time.

story:
A BED AWAY FROM HOME

Warmth you can bring along

People have used our hammocks about anywhere. But the only way to make a comfy place even better is by adding warmth. This is why we've taken it upon ourselves to find something that will provide you the comforts of home. Even when you are far away.

WORRY NO MORE

DÄCKE - Odour, tear, stain and water resistant

We don't want you to worry about anything when enjoying the great outdoors. And with DÄCKE you won't have to. We use a synthetic siliconized fiber for its insulation. Each DÄCKE ist treated with a durable water repellent. Water will splash right off and stains can be brushed away. Extra durable nylon ensure that no tears or holes will ruin your blanket. 

  • Fiber Siliconized Synthetic Insulation

We use a custom type of synthetic insulation. This means DÄCKE is free from any down sourced from animals and unlike its counterpart the hollow fibers will not lose their insulating properties. Even when wet. 

  • Warmer than your sleeping bag

We used a whopping 240q/sqm of fill weight. This means DÄCKE will be warmer than many high profile sleeping bags out there but still be as portable and packable. So you can take it anywhere. 

  • Attach it anywhere

We've included four corner loops. Wanna use it as an underquilt, stake it down or hang it up to dry? Now you can. 

  • A special kind of beauty

Function should come with form. We believe in the aestethics of nature and have modeled DÄCKE after it. Inspired by the northern lights it'll not only make you look good but also be stunning by itself. 

BORN IN GERMANY - AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE

HÄNG - Developing outdoor gear since 2014

Founded in Germany six years ago we’ve started out by manufacturing ultralight camping hammocks and delivered our product to thousands of happy customers in over forty countries.

 

  • Sustainable fabrics

Our partners do hold both, a Bluesign and an Öko-Text 100 certificate. This ensures that all goods are produced using only the most eco-friendly textiles. We are striving to ensure that all need for harsh chemicals and unsustainable substances during the entire process is eliminated. Striving for safety. 

  • A filling made entirely from recyclable materials

The siliconized fiber insulation that we will bis using in the production of DÄCKE is made entirely out of waste and scraps that will therefor be kept out of landfills. We are striving to use a ripstop nylon that will be made from 100% recycled material as well. 

EST. 2014 

Outdoors at home

This is us. The faces behind HÄNG. Founded in 2014 by Tobi and joined a little while later by Vincent we have been pushing the boundaries when it comes to hammocks made from parachute nylon. Since we'd love a good hang year round we were wondering why high-tech outdoor textiles haven't really been used for everyday objects. So we got to work. One year of trial and error, testing and lounging we are proud to present DÄCKE. Support our project with a pledge now and be one of the first to receive your blanket. 

Give us a follow to stay updated: INSTAGRAM | FACEBOOK

Risks and challenges


We are an established company with a passion for the outdoors. We have been selling out products in over 40 countries for the last six years. Trust us when we say. We at HÄNG are not new to this. We know the challenges. We have been developing this blanket for over a year making sure that each and every detail came out perfectly. We have found our components manufacturers and fulfillment partners. We have personally inspected each and every aspect and are more than confident when we say that we will be able to get this thing done. All we need is your support to help us fund the initial production run to bring the DÄCKE to life. We do our best to ensure a smooth production run, but there is always the risk that unforeseen hiccups. In the unfortunate circumstance of a delay in the production or shipment, we will keep you updated. We appreciate you being an early supporter and will work hard to maintain your trust through communication and transparency.

story:
Introducing SomerSide- The world's most uniquely designed and technologically advanced towel for your travels and everyday adventures

Stylish, convenient, and eco with 10 features and made from recycled plastic bottles, It's the first towel of its kind. 

More sustainable, more stylish, and more functional, created to suit your lifestyle. Unbelievably soft, enjoy every activity and everyday in functional comfort with SomerSide. 

 

Pack SomerSide for the day because you never know where the day will lead. From waterfalls and road trips to beach days, you can DO MORE WITH LESS. 

The only limit on what you can do is your imagination

Each towel saves 8-14 recycled plastic bottles from ending up in landfills or among our marine friends.

We’ve transformed discarded plastic bottles into the more uniquely designed and versatile towel. 

Why? Because every minute half a million plastic bottles are NOT being recycled and ending up in landfill or our oceans. SomerSide believes strongly in caring for our planet and bringing the most innovative and technology advanced towel to the market. We want to help keep plastic out of our oceans and forests, one towel at a time. We use a high grade of PET to bring you upmost quality.

The Process:

 

The three designs are given in detail below

One of our stretch goals was unlocked which is the dreamtime in XL so it now comes in two of the designs. 

 

 

Hide your valuables, SomerSide is the only towel with a hidden zip pocket. Take a dip without the worry, You never have to worry about asking someone to watch your stuff at the beach again! Carry only the essentials to the beach, perfect for surfers who worry about where to put their key when they're out in the water.

You can also put sunscreen, spare bather bottoms, lip balm, a small snack- the essentials and more

Not a fan of microfibre towels because they often feel like you're drying yourself with paper? SomerSide towels have been designed to be soft against your skin so you can enjoy using it like any other towel. We've used the most innovative technology to create soft thread from recycled plastic with a 15% blend of Nylon for that extra softness.

 

SomerSide towels have odor resistant properties so leave your wet towel in your bag for the day without the worry. 

Save space in your everyday bag and luggage. Weighing in at only 400 grams and rolling to the size of a small plastic bottle, SomerSide is the perfect towel for on-the-go, no matter whether you're a roller, folder or scruncher.  

 

 

Leave the sandcastles at the beach where they belong with SomerSide's sand-free technology.  If you ever avoid the beach just because you hate the idea of having sand everywhere, SomerSide towels allow you to have your fun in the sun without worrying and the sand!

 

  

SomerSide towels dry 3 times faster than a regular cotton towel so you can be ready from one adventure to the next. From morning yoga, to a sunset surf and picnic, use it again and again.

 

Dry off quickly and easily, the water brushes off your skin and absorbs into the towel right away. Whether you're out of the shower, pool, ocean, or any water, SomerSide towels are ultra Absorbent.

 

Sick of throwing your towel on the rack and hope it doesn't fall? Hang SomerSide anywhere to dry for your convenience with our elastic hanging hook. Placed cleverly in the middle of the towel so the bottom of the towel doesn't drag on the floor.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are bigger than a regular beach towel and our XL is great for two or for those who like some extra room. The XL doubles up as a picnic blanket for your friends and family! Our XL is currently only available in the Moroccan Mint and Aussie Dreamtime.

All our towels come in a pouch made from the same material as the towel so they're eco, soft, quick dry etc. Very handy to put wet swimwear in, easy to wash like the towels, and also a great snack bag for the beach!

Whether you like the outdoors, travelling , the beach, you're a triathlete, a festival goer, a diver, or just enjoy an active lifestyle, everyone needs a towel.

 

 

Estimated delivery is end of January/start of February. We've already invested into ordering and trialing and so we have a relationship with our manufacturer and have worked with them to create this timeline.

FREE SHIPPING TO ALL ORDERS IN AUSTRALIA & NZ. You can add on a large or an XL to your chosen Perk at checkout! Special deals available for Indiegogo ONLY

Not the number or combination of towels you are looking for even with the add-ons? No problems we can add them on manually. Please send us an email at support@somerside.com.au with the subject line 'Custom Perk' and we will get back to you ASAP! Expect a response within 24 hours. We want to make sure we deliver your order correctly and so we need to make note of all custom orders. 

FREE SHIPPING TO ALL ORDERS IN AUSTRALIA & NZ

Our Indiegogo special offers free shipping to certain destinations, check the reward table above. 

Our shipping base is located in Melbourne, Australia and will be mailed out from there. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. Aus Domestic shipments will take 3-5 business days. We are a small business and unfortunately cannot offer free worldwide shipping for all rewards at this point in time but we can offer you a great product at an excellent discount. 

CUSTOM DUTIES AND TAX

Cannot mark as gift, this is illegal, so we will not be able to do this. Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB Destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter. 

I've always been an adventurous and active soul that can’t quite commit to having my feet in one place. Having travelled for years and worked in the travel and sporting industry, the idea stemmed from the necessity to have a versatile and beautiful towel that could be used for every activity. Personal style has always been important to me and I've combined that with the functionality and versatility of the outdoors. 

SomerSide was created as a more sustainable product to keep plastic out of our oceans and forests. I took up surfing whilst living in Bali, and I quickly noticed how polluted the water was with plastic, it was everywhere. It hit me- literally. I've been hit by nappies, plastic cups, a bag caught on my foot and even have a small scar on my ankle from a sharp piece of rubbish that hit me in the water.  Protecting our environment is very important to SomerSide and myself and we will constantly strive to implement sustainable practices in everything we do. SomerSide is about doing more while using less. 

Thank you for support!

Gabriella Samkova

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Unlike a lot of campaigns, we've put countless hours and our savings into manufacturing and testing SomerSide. The next order which you will help fund will be version 3, which has already been customer tested and all the small kinks resolved. We have a manufacturer that we will be working with and have discussed our timeline to ensure we deliver as scheduled.

However, things can always happen that are beyond our control, and we do our best to communicate those challenges up front and as they arise as we have from the beginning. These include unforseen shipping delays, problems in our factory partners, government shutdowns, and more. We promise to do our best to keep our customers updated with the progress and satisfied with the final product. Your support means a lot to us and we want to ensure you’re happy with the product, people, and company you’ve backed!

In case you have questions, feel free to reach out to us at support@somerside.com.au and our team will be happy to assist you.

story:
Short Summary

In less than two months we will embark on a journey no human has ever tried before. Stoping every 4 days to rest we will be traveling along the Andes mountains from Colombia to Argentina for more than a year. We are two experienced horsemen who have dedicated our lives to the horses, the mules and the lifestyle that revolves around these amazing animals. This adventure will set the course for the rest of our lives and for that, we need your help not only to accomplish the mission but also to tell this story in the best quality posible. 

What We Need

We are trying to collect $45.000 USD before we leave. This budget will be divided between travel expenses and the filming equipment we want to buy in order to tell this story with the awesome content created along the way. 

1 - $35.000 USD for 1 year travel expenses:

-food and water for the mules

-food and water for us 

- other travel expenses ( lodging, permits to enter restricted areas, and other)

2 - $ 10.000 USD for our filming equipment:

- 4 GoPro's Hero 8 

- 1 Mavic 2 Pro 

- 1 Panasonic Lumix Gh5s

- 2 lenses (Olympus 12-40mm and 40-150mm)

What You Get

- access to our private travel blog where we'll post weekly content during our journey.  Here we'll let you know about our experiences, about the places we discover and the people we meet.

- exclusive content during our journey with special mentions of your brand

- We will build Cairns (rock stacks) along the way with your name, your loved ones name or your brand.

- For special cases we will buy your product and take it on the journey in order to create content with it in all of these amazing places.

- On our final edited documentary with special mention or executive producer on credits

 

The Impact

The Qhapaq Ñan was the most extensive and advanced transportation system in pre-Columbian South America. It is a road that hasn't been used in it's fullest for many years and we don't have actual data of its conditions. By achieving this journey we will not only be able to document every mile of the road but also achieve a world record for being the first humans to do it by mule.

Risks & Challenges

As we told you before, the road has been forgotten in time. We don't actually know if much of it's trajectories still exist or are in good condition. Our priority is the wellness and health of our entire team (the 6 mules and us two), nevertheless it is a tough road filled with uncertainty.

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on our instagram @5_tierras

Share our content and comment on our posts during the trip.

story:
The Check-In

This high volume Check-In gives you more functional design features and better performance than any other multi-purpose gear bag. Superior mobility and maneuverability courtesy of G-RO’s signature large, space saving, tough-terrain wheels.

Why Large Wheels?

All other rolling luggage are basically boxes on casters. Their little wheels break more often; they travel badly over bumps, bricks, grates, snow and sand; they weaken the luggage design with more rivets, screws and reinforcements; they require more parts to assemble and break; they reduce the available volume; and they often cause awkward nooks in the interior space.

But because of our ingenious patented wheel design, G-RO:

It can hold a LOT

The check-in's large interior volume of 86L (expandable up to 96L) can easily fit enough items for a 10+ day trip. It also has multiple compartments and external pouches so you can keep your items organized and easily access your valuables.

 

The Office

An everyday commuter companion bag that can also function as a spacious carry-on, the Office has multiple organizational compartments letting you easily access your essential items. We merged a traditional office bag with G-RO’s signature large, space saving, tough-terrain wheels to create the perfect bag for your daily commute or weekend adventure.   

 

The Backpack XV

A utility-style backpack elevated to a sophisticated travel companion for the everyday explorer. Durable construction, intuitively designed features, internal and external charging all combine to offer a backpack with next level performance for the daily commuter and weekend adventurer.

 

The Backpack Light

An elegantly designed, compact backpack that comes loaded with unique minimalist features designed to organize your valuables, give you instant access to your essentials and keep your devices safe and synced.

Materials

Ultra-Durable Ballistic Nylon

After designing the original G-RO carry-on from ballistic nylon, we created the Check-In from the same durable, water-resistant material.

630D Nylon

Flexible and lightweight, the 630D nylon was the perfect material to craft the standard Backpack Light with.

Stingrey Polyblend

After investigating different fabrics to add to the G-RO family our engineers created water-resistant polyblend that's lightweight and as fashionable as it is durable.

Smart Electronics

 

TILE

We're very excited to let you know that all G-RO products offered in this campaign will come with a TILE Slim Bluetooth Tracker. Small and compact, it works with a dedicated app that connects you to Tile, the largest lost-and-found community in the world.

International Shipping

At the present time we cannot guarantee international fulfillment from international distribution centers. While we are not certain this will be the arrangement, please be aware of any importation duties your country may charge you when buying products internationally.

Refund Policy 

Indiegogo is not a store, but rather a donation-based platform designed to bring creative projects to life. In accordance with Indiegogo’s Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or returns for non-defective merchandise. If there is a problem or defect with your product, we would be happy to assist you. Please contact us at info@g-ro.com. 

While we are not obligated to refund a pledge post-campaign, if you are truly not satisfied with your G-RO we will refund your original pledge less a 15% restocking fee to cover shipping and crowdfunding fees. You must notify us within 14 days of your receipt of the product and return your product in unused condition, along with the original packaging. 

Shipping Limitations 

When an order is placed, it will be shipped to an address designated by the purchaser as long as that shipping address is compliant and verified by our warehouse. Risk of loss and title for items purchased from this website pass to you upon delivery of the items to the carrier. You are responsible for filing any claims with carriers for damaged and/or lost shipments. 

Due to legal restrictions on shipping electronics, units in some countries will not include electronics. These countries include, but are not limited to Israel, South Korea and certain places in the Middle East. We apologize for the inconvenience. 

Warranty

We construct our luggage to last – that’s why our products are backed by warranty. Please note that the warranty only extends to the original owner of luggage sold by G-RO or an authorized G-RO reseller. Proof of purchase is required to initiate any warranty requests. Please register your product(s) by downloading the G-RO App to be eligible for warranty service.

Wheeled Luggage - The parts of your luggage that bear the most burden – the wheels – are guaranteed for life. If at any time the wheels on your luggage stop functioning normally due to manufacturer defect, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you. The body of your luggage is guaranteed for a full 5 years after your delivery date. If there is any issue caused by manufacturer defect within the first year, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you. For years two through five, your only responsibility will be the cost to ship the item(s) to us if needed. G-RO will cover return shipping. 

Non-wheeled Luggage - Non-wheeled luggage, such as backpacks, is guaranteed for a full 5 years after your delivery date. If there is any issue caused by manufacturer defect within the first year, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you. For years two through five, your only responsibility will be the cost to ship the item(s) to us if needed. G-RO will cover return shipping. 

External Components (applies to all luggage) - External components such as power banks, USB cords, power adapters and luggage trackers are guaranteed for 1 year after your delivery date. If there is any issue caused by manufacturer defect within this timeframe, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you. 

General (applies to all luggage) - The warranty in its entirety covers manufacturer defects in materials and/or workmanship and does not cover any damage caused by: Misuse (such as transportation of unusual items); accidental damage; abrasion; exposure to extreme temperatures and materials; normal wear and tear; or damage during transport (including damage caused by airline carriers or other transport providers).  

Alterations to Product

The product representations and details are current as of the time of your pledge. Although products are as close to the final version as possible, products may change throughout the campaign, and G-RO reserves the right to make any changes due to ongoing testing, materials sourcing, feedback and other development activities. Our goal is always to launch the best version of each product when it goes to production.

Thank You

We are incredibly grateful for the support we have received from our crowdfunding community. It is our pleasure to continue bringing you new and innovative products.
story_txt:
The Check-In
This high volume Check-In gives you more functional design features and better performance than any other multi-purpose gear bag. Superior mobility and maneuverability courtesy of G-RO’s signature large, space saving, tough-terrain wheels.

Why Large Wheels?


All other rolling luggage are basically boxes on casters. Their little wheels break more often; they travel badly over bumps, bricks, grates, snow and sand; they weaken the luggage design with more rivets, screws and reinforcements; they require more parts to assemble and break; they reduce the available volume; and they often cause awkward nooks in the interior space.
But because of our ingenious patented wheel design, G-RO:


It can hold a LOT
The check-in's large interior volume of 86L (expandable up to 96L) can easily fit enough items for a 10+ day trip. It also has multiple compartments and external pouches so you can keep your items organized and easily access your valuables.




 
The Office
An everyday commuter companion bag that can also function as a spacious carry-on, the Office has multiple organizational compartments letting you easily access your essential items. We merged a traditional office bag with G-RO’s signature large, space saving, tough-terrain wheels to create the perfect bag for your daily commute or weekend adventure.   



 
The Backpack XV
A utility-style backpack elevated to a sophisticated travel companion for the everyday explorer. Durable construction, intuitively designed features, internal and external charging all combine to offer a backpack with next level performance for the daily commuter and weekend adventurer.



 
The Backpack Light
An elegantly designed, compact backpack that comes loaded with unique minimalist features designed to organize your valuables, give you instant access to your essentials and keep your devices safe and synced.



Materials
Ultra-Durable Ballistic Nylon
After designing the original G-RO carry-on from ballistic nylon, we created the Check-In from the same durable, water-resistant material.
630D Nylon
Flexible and lightweight, the 630D nylon was the perfect material to craft the standard Backpack Light with.
Stingrey Polyblend
After investigating different fabrics to add to the G-RO family our engineers created water-resistant polyblend that's lightweight and as fashionable as it is durable.
Smart Electronics
 
TILE
We're very excited to let you know that all G-RO products offered in this campaign will come with a TILE Slim Bluetooth Tracker. Small and compact, it works with a dedicated app that connects you to Tile, the largest lost-and-found community in the world.


International Shipping
At the present time we cannot guarantee international fulfillment from international distribution centers. While we are not certain this will be the arrangement, please be aware of any importation duties your country may charge you when buying products internationally.
Refund Policy 
Indiegogo is not a store, but rather a donation-based platform designed to bring creative projects to life. In accordance with Indiegogo’s Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or returns for non-defective merchandise. If there is a problem or defect with your product, we would be happy to assist you. Please contact us at info@g-ro.com. 
While we are not obligated to refund a pledge post-campaign, if you are truly not satisfied with your G-RO we will refund your original pledge less a 15% restocking fee to cover shipping and crowdfunding fees. You must notify us within 14 days of your receipt of the product and return your product in unused condition, along with the original packaging.

If there is any issue caused by manufacturer defect within the first year, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you. For years two through five, your only responsibility will be the cost to ship the item(s) to us if needed. G-RO will cover return shipping.

If there is any issue caused by manufacturer defect within the first year, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you. For years two through five, your only responsibility will be the cost to ship the item(s) to us if needed. G-RO will cover return shipping.

If there is any issue caused by manufacturer defect within this timeframe, G-RO will repair or replace as deemed appropriate at no cost to you.

Thank You
We are incredibly grateful for the support we have received from our crowdfunding community. It is our pleasure to continue bringing you new and innovative products.

story:
Summary

My name is Paul Spencer and I'm an extreme athlete. For years I've had a dream of riding my bike around the world. In 2020, I'll be leaving to break the Guinness World Record of Fastest Human-Powered Circumnavigation of the Globe. I'll be raising awareness for self-propelled transport, electric-powered vehicles and the Lupus Foundation along the way. I want this to be a collaborative adventure. Besides helping me fund this trip, you're invited to join me anywhere in the world.

Right now, I'm planning the trip and concentrating on building a one-of-a-kind boat through Lomocean Designs and an innovative pedal propulsion system. 

The Boat: 

Length - 11.77m

Width - 2.92m

Draft with rudder - 0.92m

Departure weight - 1000kg

Bare boat weight - 500kg

Customized pedal system

Exterior. 

Interior cut-away. 

Interior driver's POV. 

What We Need & What You Get

These funds will go directly towards finishing this concept ocean pedal boat. We think this will revolutionize the way a human can power a boat. If the goal is met, any extra funds will be used for the land portion of the trip.

When you fund my campaign, you can choose from a variety of unique perks, everything from a sticker or t-shirt to your own boat! With any of the live perks (like the trainings and trips) we'll speak in person to organize the details. I would love to have you join me on this journey. 

Specific Funding Needs: 

  • Install side-windows
  • Install top window 
  • Install Desalinator (water maker)
  • Install navigation arch
  • Build spare navigation arch, rudder, daggerboard 
  • Shipping the boat from New Zealand to San Francisco, China to Africa, Brazil to Denver
  • Training: Pedaling the boat in the Gulf of Mexico/Caribbean 
  • Safety Equipment 
  • Pedal System

 I am very excited about the pedal system. This is a totally revolutionary way to propel a watercraft. The system will be expertly designed and built by Lomocean to optimize performance. 

The Impact

This whole expedition is designed to celebrate the power of the human body, specifically through pedal-power. Bikes changed the world, making individual transport easier. The car overtook that, and now our roads are clogged and smog fills our atmosphere. We want to get back to using our bodies to move, and this adventure will advocate for more bike lanes, less cars and more active lifestyles. 

I have loads of experience that aids me in my journey: 

  • 2010, Guinness World Record: Fastest Cycle Across the USA, N-->S, W-->E
  • 2011, Longest Bike Race in the World: Tour d' Afrique: Cairo to Cape Town
  • 2013, Guinness World Record: Fastest Cycle Across Europe, N-->S
  • 2017 Guinness World Record: Fastest Cycle Across Europe, E-->W

Check out the results page on my website to see more. 

           

           The route.

Risks & Challenges

This is a unique journey, and nobody has done it quite like this before. I'm taking all necessary precautions, talking with oceanographers, meteorologists and other athletes like myself who have attempted something similar. I'm also working with Lomocean Yacht Design, who have built and will be customizing the boat. They are the best in the world in creating unique designs for specialized trips.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please consider sharing my campaign with anyone you think would find it interesting. The journey is going to take just over 2 years, so I'll need you all to stay in touch. Check out my website and send me good vibes and give a donation to the Lupus Foundation. 

Please join the journey on my website or on social media! 

Render of exterior. 

Pedal positions: Inside the boat (reclined) will be the primary pedal position. Seat post can be inserted for to pedal with head and shoulders outside of the boat. This will be used for in and out of harbors, docking and on the ocean in calm seas for a change of scenery. 

Twin propellers, counter-rotating. 

Paul Spencer and prototype of boat.

story:
BRAVO X SLING

The Bravo X Sling is a modular anti-theft bag packed with cutting-edge features that will improve the way you carry. It's engineered to protect your gear and keep you looking good while doing it.

It's super-functional, cut-proof and is even fireproof. Wait, what? Yes, that's right. It's lined with a mid-layer of fireproof fabric made to protect in the event of a lithium battery fire. Just a little something extra.

 

 

The Bravo X comes with various anti-theft elements, to keep you safe from pickpockets, is packed with convenient travel features such as an external USB port that can also hold a SIM card and pin, and it's equipped with water-resistant materials, made to keep your gear dry.

And if that weren't enough, it also comes with optional modular features. Intrigued? Scroll down for more ;)

 

 

The fireproof fabric is graphene-coated and is fireproof up to 2000 degrees. 

The Bravo X Sling comes in 3 different high-quality fabrics. 

Made from 80% Nylon & 20% Polyester, this sleek looking material feels like wool but is highly abrasion-resistant & easy to clean. Used in the Graphite Grey version.

 

Ballistic Nylon is one of the most durable technical fabrics out there and is slightly hydrophobic, meaning it won't absorb water easily. It also has high abrasion-resistance. Used in the Jet Black version.

Both the FauxWool & Ballistic Nylon versions come with a mid-layer of Kevlar that is 5 times stronger than steel.

 

Ultra-High Molecular-Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE) is a fabric that has a very high resistance to tearing and is used in our cutproof bags. Kevlar is not used in combination with this fabric. Used in Charcoal Black & Ash Grey versions.

One of the best features of this bag is the modular accessories. Ever find yourself looking for a place to store your sunnies but end putting them over your head or on your shirt? Or how about trying to find that access card or transport card? Carry your coins in your pocket?

These modular add-ons will make these problems be a thing of the past. 

The stabiliser strap included with the bag comes with a magnetic adapter that is compatible with our modular accessories. Move from bag to strap in a second. 

The UP Passport Holder is a great add on to the Bravo X Sling. It is a 100% zero waste product that is made entirely from up-cycled materials. We used the by-product materials (that would normally be discarded) from our bags and repurpose them to create a new product: UP Passport Holder - a slim, sustainable and functional passport holder with RFID protection.

 

WE ARE ALPAKA

Our mantra is to keep moving forward. We have a real passion for sustainability, aesthetics and function. We believe combining all of these things can improve the way we live.

After 3 years of being lucky enough to do what we love, we will continue on a mission to keep creating highly functional products that are built to last. 

At the risk of sounding bias, we genuinely think you will fall in love with this bag. It will surely improve your carry experience, either on your travels or during your commute.

ALPAKA products are meant to be used every day but are also packed with convenient travel features, blurring the line between everyday and travel.

Thanks for joining us on this journey.

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

They say time flies when you're having fun. This is our 8th crowdfunding campaign (AKA "the ocho") and we're fully confident in our ability to deliver. Nevertheless, we like to see things from your perspective and understand that backing a crowdfunding campaign requires placing your trust in the creator's expertise and track-record to deliver. We think you'll be pleasantly surprised. Whether this is your first time, your 8th time or somewhere in between time backing us, a heartfelt thank you for being part of this journey.

Anti theft sling bag by Alpaka Gear

story:
Preorder on our site. 


“…a clever and sorely needed innovation.”





As seen on:


“Cyclists plug in…and the grips can take it from there.”

smrtGRiPS seamlessly integrates eyes-free navigation, haptic feedback notifications and a bike tracker. iOS and Android Ready. All right in your hands.






“Imagine riding in a new city and never having to worry about getting lost”






“smrtGRiPS connect riders to community-sourced biking data…”










“Smarten up your bike.”


Preorder on our site. 







We went all the way 8-bit old school for our device, using state-of-the-art 32-bit Bluetooth System-on-a-Chip Smart Technology, because sometimes less really is  better. It works just right, and we're pretty proud of our technologically minimalist approach. 

Thoughtfully minimalist, integrated and balanced, this is technology that will doesn’t stick out. It's all about improving that symbiotic relationship between you and your bike, so you can have a ride that’s smart and connected, but frees you to enjoy that immersive experience called The Ride. 

Look at it this way – you can squint at a screen, or you can ride –  take in the view, be with your friends, and fully enjoy the trail. 

smrtGRiPs Connect App's unique features improve  and perfect your Eyes-Free Connected Biking Experience: 

  • Eyes-Free Navigation
  • Right and left haptic feedback custom notifications
  • Notification prioritization and customization for your Google Maps, Google Fit and Apple Healthkit notifications
  • Highly audible custom alerts
  • Crowd-sourced Bike Tracking
  • Separation alert (up to 10 riders*)
  • SmrtGRiPs Connect Navigation enabled by Telenav's Scout SDK. (Turn-by-turn directions, Bike lanes, Popular Routing, Buddy Radar (nearby Friends) and more.


Compatible with iPhone 4s & later, iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android 4.4 devices with Bluetooth 4.1. 


*For iPhone and iPad. For Android, it depends on model.







The smrtGRiPS Indiegogo Featured Perk includes the smrtGRiPS Grips, the smrtGRiPS devices and charger. The smrtGRiPS Grips will fit into any standard handlebars (except drop downs. Drop down version available in Q2 2015). Made of a durable and grippy rubber that will give you all the control you need. And when paired with smrtGRiPS devices, you'll have all the foresight needed to make any bike trip an enjoyable one. Add an upgrade. Get your reward. Quantities are limited.

Preorder on our site. 

smrtGRiPs MTB/BMX Upgrade

When going on the trail, we love our Lock Clamp Grips.  They stay on, don't rotate and they can be removed and reinstalled as needed. They are tough and reliable on carbon and  aluminum handlebars, like smrtGRiPS.  We have designed a lock ring for Lock Clamp Grips, so you can enjoy smrtGRiPS wherever the trail brings you. And we are making them with the highest quality alloy and grippiest rubber. They won't disappoint. If you want the smrtGRiPS version with the greatest staying power, then choose the smrtGRiPs MTB/BMX Upgrade for only $23 or you can get the Upgrade for free by bringing in $200 in referrals. Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). 

smrtGRiPs Brooks* Slender Grips Upgrade


We love Brooks England* Bike Accessoires and we wanted the smrtGRiPS to have the same high quality look and feel. We designed a lock ring for our smrtGRiPS that is truly inspired by the Brooks Slender Grip. It fits and matches perfectly.  If you have Brooks Slenders Grips, get the Brooks Slender Grips Upgrade for only $18 or you can the Upgrade for free  or you can get the Upgrade for free by bringing in $180 in referrals. Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). 
This perk only includes the external lock rings (2)  designed for the Brooks* Slenders Grips, and not the grips. 





  1. Unscrew both lock rings. Pull out grip assembly.
  2. Replace the external lock ring with the provided external lock ring and tighten. Make sure not to overtorque the screw especially if you have a carbon handlebar. No more than 7.5 Nm in most cases. Please check with manufacturer's recommandations.
  3. Insert the smrtGRiPS device into the grip and  tighten. 


The Specs

Get a close look and find out why smrtGRiPs are actually light sabres in disguise.
  • Aluminium casing
  • 300ft bluetooth range
  • Waterproof up to 10m 
  • High capacity rechargeable battery (3.7v/700mAh)

Diameter: 15.8mm

Length: 152mm

Battery life: One charge will last 3 months under normal use (2 hours of riding per day/Beacon in operation 24/7 ). Good for 800 cycles (at least 3 years).

Connectivity: Bluetooth Smart 4.2

Connector: IP68 micro USB connector

Over-the-air Download Firmware Upgrades: The Bluetooth Smart SoC (System on a Chip) component on the smrtGRIPS is OTA-DFU (Over-the-air Device Firmware  Upgrade) enabled, so you'll always be the first to have the most recent version of the smrtGRIPS available.

Device Compatibility: iPhones 4s & later. iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android devices with 4.4 or above

smrtGRiPS Connected Bike Grips is IP protected.


About us

You’ve met smrtGRiPs. Now meet us.

smrtGRiPs are developed by Boréal Bikes, headquartered in Montreal, with its R&D group in Berlin, Germany. We were working on the bike of the future – an electric hybrid ebike – and the smrtGRiPs were one of the bike’s key features.

We soon realized that the applications of the smrtGRiPs were not limited to the bike of the future – it was perfect for the bikes of today.

We believe that eyes free navigation with haptic feedback notification, the security of a global bike tracker, and the ability to find your bike in a crowd could have a huge impact on the safety and the riding pleasure of many. Right now.

So – for right now – we’ve turned our focus and efforts to smrtGRiPs. We want to get it ready for the bikes of today.

The goal?  Give everyone the ability to make their bike – or their mobility scooter, electric scooter, push scooter, moped, motor bike, snowmobile, personal water craft, ski poles, Nordic walking poles – smarter, safer and more fun to use.

We want to put the future in everyone’s hands today.

 Louis-P. Huard  - Co-founder, Designer and Team Leader
First and foremost, Louis is a cycling and tech enthusiast. A seasoned marketing professional that loves great design and smart innovation.  He has extensive experience in the development of new products for several Fortune 500 companies. He's been involved in the launches of innovative products from Blackberry, Unilever, ABInBev, among others.


Matthias Budzinski - Co-founder, Mechanical Prototyping
Matthias is a hands-on builder.  Any piece of metal or wood, he turns it into elaborate furniture or the tiniest prototype. At Boréal Bikes, his skill are much appreciated because he's building component by component the future of cycling. M.Sc. Candidate at the Technical University of Berlin.



Uli Westhoff - Co-founder, Mobile and Embedded Systems Engineering
Uli is our Tech Guru. An embedded system engineer and developer that has developped embedded measuring devices for F1 Racing. He has done lots of works for the auto industry, but his true passion has always revolved around bikes. 



Dr Sylvia Niebruegge - Customer Happiness
Product Specialist at one of Germany's fastest growing biotech companies for the past five years. Sylvia's knows everything you need to know when it comes to launching innovative tech and making customers happy. 


Slobodan Visnjic - Product Engineering 
Bodan is helping us cruise along the prototyping and manufacturing process. A Solidworks Native, he has already helped several members of the maker community  transform their inventions into market ready products.  He knows what it takes to turn a good idea into a great product.




Risk and Challenges

We have lined up valuable and expert partners that will be involved in important areas of product development and manufacturing. The prototypes we have produced have helped us confirm that we can manage risks associated to their development and production. 

Supply Chain

We reduced the number of parts required to manufacture the smrtGRiPS by choosing high quality and  highly integrated components.  By doing so,  we believe that we have reduced our exposure to delays that could potentially occur by longer than expected lead times.

Crowdsourced Design: Making it Perfect

As soon as the campaign gets going, we will be looking into what our backers have to say regarding the final design.  We have included this step in our production process so you can help us create you the best smrtGRiPS ever. We believe that your contribution will  maximize your ROI (Return On Investment). There is nothing more valuable than having a product that you really want. 

The Great Outdoors

smrtGRiPs are designed to  work in the most extreme weather conditions, and even under water (10m). Once we are certain that the smrtGRiPS can perform as expected in severe weather conditions, we will initiate pre-production. We accounted for testing in our schedule. Our first pre-production samples will be submitted to a battery of tests. It's difficult to predict the exact outcome. It is a possibility that testing may take longer than expected, in order to make the modifications needed to reach the standards we are aiming for. 

The Litmus Test: Certification 

Following the pre-production run, the smrtGRiPs will undergo all the necessary steps for certification. These are the the governing bodies’ mandatory requirements  that we must comply with in order to ship to the different countries. These tests will need to happen before delivering smrtGRiPs to our backers. Even though several of our team members are well versed in these requirements, there is a risk that we may face delays in the eventuality that some of the components parts have to be reworked or adjusted.


Ok. Any questions?


How big are smrtGRiPs?

We designed the smrtGRiPs to be so small that it can be attached discretely to virtually any handlebar. It’s only 16 mm in diameter and 150mm in length – about the size of a standard felt pen – and weighs less than 95 grams. That’s about 3.5 ounces.

How long do the batteries last?

Under normal use (2 hours of commuting per day/beacons on 24/7), the smrtGRiPs batteries will last over 3 months.

How do I recharge the batteries?

Recharge the smrtGRIPs using the smrtGRIPs charger or connect it to a USB power source using micro USB cable. 

What is smrtGRIPS' range?

smrtGRIPs' range is approximately 100 meters (330 feet).

How do smrtGRiPs attach to your bike?

You simply insert it into your handlebar and screw it to the provided grip or the lock ring.

How are smrtGRiPs unique?

  1. First ever all-in-one eyes-free navigation, haptic feedback notifications with bike tracker grips.
  2. First bike app designed for optimal eyes-free user experience. Be safe and enjoy your journey by keeping your eyes on the road, not on your display.
  3. Super stealthy. They're really, really, really, ridiculously integrated. No one will notice it.
  4. Bike Tracker: Technology that allows users to locate their items after they have been lost. The smrtGRiPs Connect App is designed to work on the world's largest crowdGPS network, currently locating lost items 8 times every minute.
  5. Redundant Beacons: Unlike single item trackers, your bike gets two devices acting as beacons for increased reliability and availability. If one fails, you'll still have another smrtGRIPs signaling away.
  6. Separation Alert: Notifies you when a member of your family or bike tour group loses his way.
  7. Bike Finder: The Bike Finder remembers where you left your bike last on a GPS map. At close range, but still can't find it? Make it ring!
  8. High Capacity Lithium Ion Battery: The smrtGRiPs battery capacity  is 4 times greater than most item trackers on the market, and it's rechargeable. A single charge will last over 3 months.

Can I use your product with other BLE Tracking devices?

Absolutely! The smrtGRiPs Connect App can work with other BLE tracking devices, Bluetooth cars, headsets and more. You'll be able to use the Bike Finder and Separation Alert Features with such devices. However, to enjoy these features as they were originally intended you will need the smrtGRiPS devices.

Can I use smrtGRiPs with Google Maps?

Yes! smrtGRiPs left/right haptic feedback notifications respond to Google Maps turn-by-turn notifications. We intend to support  more navigation apps in the future.

Can I use smrtGRiPs with a drop down handlebar?

The current smrtGRiPs available are not designed for drop down handlebars. However, a drop down smrtGRiPs version is planned for Q2 2015.

What's your plan for Android support?

We're developping on Android using the Bluetooth Low Energy API's. We're dedicated on providing a world class Android app.  Android is supported at launch.

How many smrtGRiPs devices can a smartphone find?

Using the smrtGRiPs app, a smartphone can manage up to 10 smrtGRIPs  at once on iOS. On Android, this number varies from 1 to 10.

Is the device water resistant?

The device is actually waterproof, so you can ride through heavy rain or drop your bike in a canal as long as it is not deeper than 10m. 

Where are smrtGRiPS made?

The smrtGRiPs are designed and engineered in Germany. Parts are sourced in the US and China.

How much is shipping?

Shipping and handling, which includes packing and fulfilling orders, will cost $10 in the Domestic United States (including Hawaii and Alaska), $20 to Canada, and $30 for international orders.

Where do I pay for shipping?

You need to add your shipping cost in the additional donation field when you back the campaign.

Oops! I forgot to add amount for shipping! What should I do?

Please contribute the right shipping amount and select no perk. We will match your contributions.

I want to upgrade my perk

Please contribute the difference and select no perk. We will match up your contribution to the correct perk and will confirm after the campaign.

Is this iOS 8 Compatible?

Yes, it is compatible from iOS 7 & on.

Will smrtGRiPs work with the COBI Bike System?

Since the product is not readily available, we can't guarantee it yet, but we don't see why not. We believe that the smrtGRiPs could be an ideal companion product for the COBI, so it can provide an Eyes-Free Connected Biking Experience too. We are committed to supporting it as soon as it is possible. Full disclosure, we are COBI backers and think it's cool, and we're looking forward on receiving our COBI Dev Kit.

*Are you associated or affiliated with Brooks England or any brands mentioned in this campaign?

*No, we are not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Brooks England LTD. All trademarks mentioned belong to their owners, third party brands, product names, trade names, corporate names and company names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners or registered trademarks of other companies and are used for purposes of explanation and to the contributor's benefit, without implying a violation of copyright law. The Brooks Slender Grips are not included in any of the perks, only the purpose-built external lock rings designed for Brooks Slender Grips are included in the Brooks Slender Grips Upgrade perk.

Problem backing us?

Please contact support@indiegogo.com.


What's coming next

November 2013

  • The idea was born

January 2014

  • Development of prototype bike of the future

May 2014

  • First prototype of our vision of the bike of the future


    • June 2014 -August 2014

  • Second  prototype is built with advanced electronics

    • August 2014-December 2014

    Development of smrtGRiPs

    • Electronics and housing developments
    • Development of mobile app
    • PCB with Bluetooth SoC designed
    • Refinement of electronics 
    • Sourcing and productions partners selected
    • Working prototype tested
    • Facebook page launched
    • Video production 

    January 2015

    Spread the word

    • Launch of Indiegogo Campaign

    After the launch

    • Plastic and electronics tooling ordered
    • App finalized for Android and iOS
    • Antenna refinement
    • Firmware refinement
    • Tooling completed
    • Preproduction units received and tested
    • Certifications- FCC, CE and Bluetooth
    • Production approved and full production initiated
    • App released to Apple Stores and Google Play

    July-August 2015

    • First delivery received
    • Begin fulfillment of perks in order received
    • Final orders fulfilled

     

    Preorder on our site.
story_txt:
Preorder on our site. 
“…a clever and sorely needed innovation.”


As seen on:“Cyclists plug in…and the grips can take it from there.”
smrtGRiPS seamlessly integrates eyes-free navigation, haptic feedback notifications and a bike tracker. iOS and Android Ready. All right in your hands.




“Imagine riding in a new city and never having to worry about getting lost”

“smrtGRiPS connect riders to community-sourced biking data…” 












“Smarten up your bike.”



Preorder on our site. 


















We went all the way 8-bit old school for our device, using state-of-the-art 32-bit Bluetooth System-on-a-Chip Smart Technology, because sometimes less really is  better. It works just right, and we're pretty proud of our technologically minimalist approach. 
Thoughtfully minimalist, integrated and balanced, this is technology that will doesn’t stick out. It's all about improving that symbiotic relationship between you and your bike, so you can have a ride that’s smart and connected, but frees you to enjoy that immersive experience called The Ride. 
Look at it this way – you can squint at a screen, or you can ride –  take in the view, be with your friends, and fully enjoy the trail. 
smrtGRiPs Connect App's unique features improve  and perfect your Eyes-Free Connected Biking Experience: 

Eyes-Free Navigation
Right and left haptic feedback custom notifications
Notification prioritization and customization for your Google Maps, Google Fit and Apple Healthkit notifications 
Highly audible custom alerts
Crowd-sourced Bike Tracking
Separation alert (up to 10 riders*)
SmrtGRiPs Connect Navigation enabled by Telenav's Scout SDK. (Turn-by-turn directions, Bike lanes, Popular Routing, Buddy Radar (nearby Friends) and more.


Compatible with iPhone 4s & later, iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android 4.4 devices with Bluetooth 4.1. 



*For iPhone and iPad. For Android, it depends on model.










The smrtGRiPS Indiegogo Featured Perk includes the smrtGRiPS Grips, the smrtGRiPS devices and charger. The smrtGRiPS Grips will fit into any standard handlebars (except drop downs. Drop down version available in Q2 2015). Made of a durable and grippy rubber that will give you all the control you need. And when paired with smrtGRiPS devices, you'll have all the foresight needed to make any bike trip an enjoyable one. Add an upgrade. Get your reward. Quantities are limited.




Preorder on our site. 






smrtGRiPs MTB/BMX Upgrade

When going on the trail, we love our Lock Clamp Grips.  They stay on, don't rotate and they can be removed and reinstalled as needed. They are tough and reliable on carbon and  aluminum handlebars, like smrtGRiPS.  We have designed a lock ring for Lock Clamp Grips, so you can enjoy smrtGRiPS wherever the trail brings you. And we are making them with the highest quality alloy and grippiest rubber. They won't disappoint. If you want the smrtGRiPS version with the greatest staying power, then choose the smrtGRiPs MTB/BMX Upgrade for only $23 or you can get the Upgrade for free by bringing in $200 in referrals. Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). 




smrtGRiPs Brooks* Slender Grips Upgrade








We love Brooks England* Bike Accessoires and we wanted the smrtGRiPS to have the same high quality look and feel. We designed a lock ring for our smrtGRiPS that is truly inspired by the Brooks Slender Grip. It fits and matches perfectly.  If you have Brooks Slenders Grips, get the Brooks Slender Grips Upgrade for only $18 or you can the Upgrade for free  or you can get the Upgrade for free by bringing in $180 in referrals. Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). 
This perk only includes the external lock rings (2)  designed for the Brooks* Slenders Grips, and not the grips. 








Unscrew both lock rings. Pull out grip assembly.
Replace the external lock ring with the provided external lock ring and tighten. Make sure not to overtorque the screw especially if you have a carbon handlebar. No more than 7.5 Nm in most cases. Please check with manufacturer's recommandations.
Insert the smrtGRiPS device into the grip and  tighten. 










The Specs

Get a close look and find out why smrtGRiPs are actually light sabres in disguise.

Aluminium casing

300ft bluetooth range


Waterproof up to 10m 


High capacity rechargeable battery (3.7v/700mAh)


Diameter: 15.8mm
Length: 152mm
Battery life: One charge will last 3 months under normal use (2 hours of riding per day/Beacon in operation 24/7 ). Good for 800 cycles (at least 3 years).
Connectivity: Bluetooth Smart 4.2
Connector: IP68 micro USB connector
Over-the-air Download Firmware Upgrades: The Bluetooth Smart SoC (System on a Chip) component on the smrtGRIPS is OTA-DFU (Over-the-air Device Firmware  Upgrade) enabled, so you'll always be the first to have the most recent version of the smrtGRIPS available.
Device Compatibility: iPhones 4s & later. iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android devices with 4.4 or above
smrtGRiPS Connected Bike Grips is IP protected.



About us



You’ve met smrtGRiPs. Now meet us.

smrtGRiPs are developed by Boréal Bikes, headquartered in Montreal, with its R&D group in Berlin, Germany. We were working on
the bike of the future – an electric hybrid ebike – and the smrtGRiPs were one of
the bike’s key features. 
We soon realized that the applications of the smrtGRiPs were not
limited to the bike of the future – it was perfect for the bikes of today.
We believe that eyes free navigation
with haptic feedback notification, the security of a global bike tracker, and the
ability to find your bike in a crowd could have a huge impact on the safety and
the riding pleasure of many. Right now.
So – for right now – we’ve turned our
focus and efforts to smrtGRiPs. We want to get it ready for the bikes of
today.

The goal?  Give everyone the ability to make their bike –
or their mobility scooter, electric scooter, push scooter, moped, motor bike,
snowmobile, personal water craft, ski poles, Nordic walking poles – smarter,
safer and more fun to use.
We want to put the future in everyone’s
hands today.
