story:
The Goal

I am attempting to raise enough funds to launch the first season of an Interactive Adventure show.  This video web series will allow viewers to guide the host across Canada and the United States, visiting various unique geographical regions.

The first Adventure will be to New York City, from August 6 to 9, 2012. 

 

Taking Risks

Just over 3 years ago I summoned the courage to chase a dream that seemed absolutely crazy to all my friends and family. I decided that my future would become completely reliant on entertaining people by producing YouTube videos.

What started out with creating simple Video Game tutorials, quickly became an obsession to reinvent myself and explore the seemingly limitless opportunities of film and video web series.

Last Year, I experimented with a spontaneous travel show called "Gamers Abroad".  In the very first episode, I flew across the Atlantic Ocean, ran around Rome, Italy for 24 hrs attempting to complete various tasks that viewers asked me to do, and returned back home the following day.  The entire experience was captured on film and shared with my followers.

You can watch the video here, http://youtu.be/v8OlE34HVPI

However, I felt like there was something missing from the show, so I put the idea on the backburner, providing me time to explore other options and learn more about what my "job" actually is.

 

Light Bulb!

One year later, Interactive Idiot was born; it evolved from the realization that everything I do is meant to entertain my viewers, and what better way than to make them feel like they had actually taken an adventure with me, rather than simply watching videos of someone else’s trip.

The "Interactive" aspect is critical to the overall experience I am attempting to bring to life.  Throughout the adventure, followers will be given pictures or short videos (30-60 seconds long) with options on where to go and what to see in REAL time. 

Followers of Interactive Idiot will be required to follow me on my Twitter account, https://twitter.com/#!/GUNNS4HIRE , where they will be provided with regular updates throughout each and every adventure.

The resulting video series essentially becomes a shared adventure, something that you personally had a hand in creating.

Interactive Idiot is the evolution of a conventional travel show.  This kind of experience is only now possible thanks to online social connectivity, via Smart phones, tablets, and Social media websites like Twitter.

Help me start the most amazing interactive worldwide adventure series that you will ever be a part of.

story:
Traveling is pure joy for most of us. If it is business or holidays, coming back from a trip is always full of memories and joyful moments. When it comes to the actual traveling part, we don’t have the same great memories. The only memories we have are aching shoulders or backs, missing items or just a big mess that takes a long time to sort out once you get back home. 

 

OWLAESY Backpack now a solution to all these problems.

 

OWLAESY backpack is not just an ordinary backpack for commuters and travelers. OWLAESY backpack is the 2 in1 bag designed with the modern-day urbanite in mind. Change Modular to fit your needs & style, which can be what you need it to be and hold what you need it to hold, without any wasted space or unnecessary items slowing you down. With the built-in carry-on closet, you can always keep your clothes neat & orderly.  OWLAESY Backpack is a cool backpack far more than you expect.  

Keep Cool & Commute on

  • Built-in Carry-on Closet - Save space, stay organized, keep clothes wrinkle. 
  • Secure and stylish design: front pocket covered by the sleeves and back pocket secure against your back.
  • Expandable space up to 42 liters.
  • Environmental friendly. 100% recycling materials.
  • Comfortable to wear. Ergonomic adjustable backpack straps for heavier carry-on and more comfortable wearing; padded back panel for extra support and comfort.
  • Good value for money.

The portable built-in Carry-on Closet makes unpacking a breeze and acts as a portable hanging shelving system when you travel. Hangs in the closet or on the shower curtain rod.

 

 

  • Save space, stay organized, keep clothes wrinkle-free and clean!
  • Make packing and unpacking easy and efficient with these hanging travel shelves.
  • 5 tiered portable shelving & travel organizer with high strength stell hooks keeps clothing tidy and pressed during travel.

 

 

 

We have included shoe storage in the wardrobe, where you can fit a pair of shoes. The shoe compartment is isolated from the rest of the wardrobe and is lined with moisture-resistant nylon and special coating to ensure the smell does not seep through into the other compartments.

With OWLAESY 2 in 1 backpack, you will never have to buy another bag again.

Swap them out anytime. It's as easy as:

OWLAESY provides space for essential work tools such as a laptop, notebook, pens and more. Sometimes you just want quick access to your laptop. This comes especially convenient during security screenings in airports. OWLAESY has a padded laptop compartment that can fit up to a 17" Apple Macbook Pro.

 

It gives you instant access to everything you need.

 

We've made it a great bag regardless of the shelf. This means improved internal organization - allows for way better organization in case you're on a trip where you don't use the shelf.

 

 

Engineered to offer maximum comfort and smooth.

 

A sternum strap for stability for heavy loads or long trips as well as added comfort and support. OWLAESY has ergonomic padding to ensure that you can fill up the bag and it won't lose its shape against your back. We also used breathable mesh to reduce the heat the backpack creates against your body.

 

 

At 30 x 30 x 44cm this bag meets domestic and international carry-on standards.

Volume: 42L

 

We partner with the industry's veterans, having strict screening standard on best materials. Our direct collection from consumers helps us improve day by day. We hope to provide with the market high-quality backpack with unique stylish design, at a good value.

When it comes to the actual traveling part, we don’t have the same great memories. story:
Short Summary

Dear friends of Skala Kallonis - Lesvos,

We have formed a team of three people, who have the same thoughts of developing tourism in Skala Kallonis. We have seen that things need to be changed. So along with other projects which are already running, we would like to top all these up with the upgrade of the western beach of Skala Kallonis.

We are Edwin Nicolaas, Jan Michielsen and Vasilis Vogiagis.

Edwin loves the place from the first day he arrived and has a small business in Skala Kallonis for about 8 years now.

Jan has moved here 25 years ago and has been dealing with tourism, working as a chef in restaurants.

Vasilis is a hotel manager in Skala Kallonis the last 20 years and has lived with all kind of crises that Skala Kallonis has faced.

We all want to do this project of the upgrade of Skala Kallonis. In previous years there were parasols and beach beds, but unfortunately these people have retired. Nobody came along with a new idea of upgrading the beach and it has been left without any attention the last 7 years. 

We must mention that a big holdback was the refugee crisis that Lesbos as an island was dealing with from 2015 - 2016. Even charter flights were reduced to a minimum. Everybody in Skala Kallonis has suffered a lot.

Now, for year 2018, everybody is very optimistic about the development of Tourism. The number of flights have risen  again to nearly to the pre-crisis time. It is expected that many tourists will visit again the island. 

So Skala Kallonis needs a  beautiful beach with parasols, sunbeds and a nice beach bar. This project cannot be handled by ourselves. This is why we are asking for your help.

We have estimated that the contribution which is needed will be € 100.000,=.

With this ammount of money we will buy:

  1. 50 parasols 2.2 x 2.2 meters
  2. 100 luxury sunbeds with cuchins 
  3. canteen construction for the bar and equipment
  4. machinery for cleaning up the beach
  5. a lifeguard cabin
  6. showers
  7. dressing cabins
  8. exotic plantation for the beach

We think that with the above improvements the western beach of Skala Kallonis will be an excellent spot for all the visitors where they can enjoy their holidays. This has been  a demand from all the guests of Skala Kallonis which arrive every year over the last 25 years.

Donations and offers

$ 60,= or € 50,= offers 7 days free use of 1 parasol and 2 sunbeds per couple

$ 90,= or € 75,= offers 7 days free use of 2 parasols and 4 sunbeds per family

$ 240,= or € 200,= offers 7 days free use of 1 parasol and 2 sunbeds and free drinks (coffee,        refreshments, beer, wine)

$ 120,= or € 100,= offers 14 days free use of 1 parasol and 2 sunbeds per couple

$ 180,= or € 150,= offers 14 days free use of 2 parasols and 4 sunbeds for families

$ 480,= or € 400,= offers 14 days free use of 1 parasol and 2 sunbeds and free drinks (coffee, refreshments, beer, wine)

If we do not reach our goal then either we will establish something smaller or everybody will get their money back minus the cost of the administration 5%.

Thank you in advance for your understanding and your contribution.

Yours sincerely

Edwin, Jan, Vasilis

Team Skala Kallonis Beach
